anya-e0809n:29: Bhiyyo rūpantarā sāha, cariyena ca katthaci;
anya-e0809n:35: Pumitthiyaṃ padaṃ dvīsu, sabbaliṅge ca tīsviti;
anya-e0809n:38: Bhiyyo payoga māgamma, sogate āgame kvaci;
anya-e0809n:52: Jino, sakko tu siddhattho, suddhodani ca gotamo.
anya-e0809n:54: Sakyasīho tathā sakya, muni cādiccabandhu ca;
anya-e0809n:56: Mokkho nirodho nibbānaṃ, dīpo taṇhakkhayo paraṃ;
anya-e0809n:57: Tāṇaṃ leṇa marūpañca, santaṃ sacca manālayaṃ.
anya-e0809n:64: Dukkhakkhayo byābajjhañca byāpajjaṃ (ṭīkā), vivaṭṭaṃ khema kevalaṃ;
anya-e0809n:65: Apavaggo virāgo ca, paṇīta maccutaṃ padaṃ.
anya-e0809n:67: Yogakkhemo pāra mapi, mutti santi visuddhiyo;
anya-e0809n:70: Khīṇāsavo tva’sekkho ca, vītarāgo tathā’ rahā;
anya-e0809n:74: Tidasā tva’marā devā, vibudhā ca sudhāsino;
anya-e0809n:75: Surā marū divokā cā, matapā saggavāsino.
anya-e0809n:77: Nijjarā’ nimisā dibbā, apume devatāni ca devatā eva devatāni, sakatthe nipaccayo (ṭīkā);
anya-e0809n:79: Siddho bhūto ca gandhabbo, guyhako yakkha rakkhasā;
anya-e0809n:88: Vāsudevo hari harī (ṭīkā) kaṇho, kesavo cakkapāṇya’tha;
anya-e0809n:91: Haro vutto kumāro tu, khandho sattidharo bhave;
anya-e0809n:93: Sakko purindado deva, rājā vajirapāṇi ca;
anya-e0809n:97: Suranātho ca vajira, hattho ca bhūtapatya’pi.
anya-e0809n:100: Viḍojo tha sujā tassa sujātā’ssa (ṭīkā), bhariyā tha puraṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:102: Masakkasārā masakkasāro (sī.) vassoka, sārā cevā’ marāvatī;
anya-e0809n:108: Erāvaṇo gajo paṇḍu, kambalo tu silāsanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:111: Nandanaṃ missakaṃ citta, latā phārusakaṃ vanā.
anya-e0809n:117: Vimāno nitthiyaṃ byamhaṃ, pīyūsaṃ tvamataṃ sudhā;
anya-e0809n:118: Sineru meru tidivā, dhāro neru sumeru ca.
anya-e0809n:126: Kapparukkho tu santānā, dayo devaddumā siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n:128: Pācī patījhu’ dīci’tthī, pubba pacchima uttarā;
anya-e0809n:131: Erāvato erāvaṇo (sī.), amarakose pana erāvato eva atthi puṇḍarīko, vāmano kumudo’ ñjano;
anya-e0809n:134: Dhataraṭṭho ca gandhabbā, dhipo, kumbhaṇḍasāmi tu;
anya-e0809n:138: Aḷakā alakā (amarakosa) ḷakamandāssa, purī, paharaṇaṃ gadā;
anya-e0809n:141: Jātavedo sikhī joti, pāvako dahano’ nalo;
anya-e0809n:142: Hutāvaho’ ccimā dhūma, ketva’ggi gini bhānumā.
anya-e0809n:144: Tejo dhūmasikho vāyu, sakho ca kaṇhavattanī;
anya-e0809n:147: Vipphuliṅgaṃ phuliṅgañca, bhasmā ‘bhasmā’ tipadaṃ rājādigaṇe pariyāpannaṃ (rūpasiddhi-uṇādi), bhasmaṃ (sī.) tu seṭṭhi chārikā;
anya-e0809n:149: Kukkuḷo tu’ṇhabhasmasmi, maṅgāro’lāta mummukaṃ tikaṃ dittakaṭṭhādindhane (ṭīkā);
anya-e0809n:155: Gandhavāho tathā vāyo, samīro ca sadāgati.
anya-e0809n:157: Vāyubhedā ime chu’ddha, ṅgamo cādhogamo tathā;
anya-e0809n:163: Vego javo rayo khippaṃ, tu sīghaṃ turitaṃ lahu;
anya-e0809n:164: Āsu tuṇṇa maraṃ cāvi, lambitaṃ tuvaṭaṃpi ca.
anya-e0809n:166: Satataṃ nicca maviratā, nārata santata manavaratañca dhuvaṃ;
anya-e0809n:167: Bhusa matisayo ca daḷhaṃ, tibbe’kantā’timatta, bāḷhāni;
anya-e0809n:168: Khippādī paṇḍake dabbe, dabbagā tesu ye tisu.
anya-e0809n:170: Aviggaho tu kāmo ca, manobhū madano bhave;
anya-e0809n:171: Antako vasavattī ca, pāpimā ca pajāpati.
anya-e0809n:173: Pamattabandhu kaṇho ca, māro namuci, tassa tu;
anya-e0809n:174: Taṇhā’ratī ragā dhītū, hatthī tu girimekhalo.
anya-e0809n:177: Vepacitti pulomo ca, kimpuriso tu kinnaro.
anya-e0809n:188: Abbhaṃ tīsvatha vassañca, vassanaṃ vuṭṭhi nāriyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:191: Meghanāde tu dhanitaṃ, gajjitaṃ rasitādi ca;
anya-e0809n:199: Indu cando ca nakkhatta, rājā somo nisākaro.
anya-e0809n:202: Sītaraṃsi nisānātho, uḷurājā ca mā pume.
anya-e0809n:204: Kalā soḷasamo bhāgo, bimbaṃ tu maṇḍalaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:205: Aḍḍho tvaddho upaḍḍho ca, vā khaṇḍaṃ sakalaṃ pume.
anya-e0809n:207: Addhaṃ vuttaṃ same bhāge, pasādo tu pasannatā;
anya-e0809n:208: Komudī candikā juṇhā, kanti sobhā juti cchavi.
anya-e0809n:211: Cihanaṃ cāpi sobhā tu, paramā susamā tha ca.
anya-e0809n:213: Sītaṃ guṇe, guṇiliṅgā, sīta sisira sītalā;
anya-e0809n:214: Himaṃ tuhina mussāvo, nīhāro mahikā pyatha.
anya-e0809n:216: Nakkhattaṃ joti bhaṃ tārā, apume tārako’ḷu ca;
anya-e0809n:219: Migasira magasira (sī.) maddā ca punabbasu, phusso pusso (ṭī.) cāsilesa’pi.
anya-e0809n:221: Māghā magha (sī.) ca phaggunī dve ca, hatthā cittā ca svātipi;
anya-e0809n:222: Visākhā’ nurādhā jeṭṭhā, mūlā’ sāḷhā duve tathā.
anya-e0809n:224: Savaṇo ca dhaniṭṭhā ca, satabhisajo pubbu’ttarabhaddapadā;
anya-e0809n:227: Sobbhānu kathito rāhu, sūrādī tu navaggahā;
anya-e0809n:228: Rāsi mesādiko bhadda, padā poṭṭhapadā samā.
anya-e0809n:234: Raṃsimā bhākaro bhānu, akko sahassaraṃsi ca.
anya-e0809n:236: Raṃsi ābhā pabhā ditti, ruci bhā juti dīdhiti;
anya-e0809n:237: Marīci dvīsu bhānvaṃ’su, mayūkho kiraṇo karo.
anya-e0809n:249: Dasa khaṇamuhutto te, divaso tu ahaṃ dinaṃ.
anya-e0809n:255: Nisā ca rajanī ratti, tiyāmā saṃvarī bhave;
anya-e0809n:259: Andhakāro tamo nitthī, timisaṃ timiraṃ mataṃ.
anya-e0809n:262: Vanasaṇḍo ghano megha, paṭalaṃ cā’ḍḍharatti ca.
anya-e0809n:265: Pāṭipado tu dutiyā, tatiyādī tithī tithi, tāyati pāletīti tithi, tā+iti (ṇvādi) dvisu.
anya-e0809n:270: Ghaṭikā saṭṭhya’ horatto, pakkho te dasa pañca ca;
anya-e0809n:274: Citto vesākha, jeṭṭho cā, sāḷho dvīsu ca sāvaṇo;
anya-e0809n:277: Māgasiro tathā phusso, kamena māgha phagguṇā;
anya-e0809n:284: Kamā hemanta gimhāna, vassānā utuyo dvisu.
anya-e0809n:287: Cha vā vasanto ca gimha vassānā;
anya-e0809n:288: Saradoti kamā māsā, dve dve vuttānusārena.
anya-e0809n:295: Vassa saṃvaccharā nitthī, sarado hāyano samā.
anya-e0809n:297: Kappakkhayo tu saṃvaṭṭo, yuganta palayā api;
anya-e0809n:302: Pāpañca kibbisaṃ verā, ghaṃ duccarita dukkaṭaṃ;
anya-e0809n:305: Kusalaṃ sukataṃ sukkaṃ, puññaṃ dhamma manitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:312: Hāso’ ttamanatā pīti, vitti tuṭṭhi ca nāriyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:315: Pāmojjañca pamodo tha, sukhaṃ sātañca phāsva’tha;
anya-e0809n:316: Bhaddaṃ seyyo subhaṃ khemaṃ, kalyāṇaṃ maṅgalaṃ sivaṃ.
anya-e0809n:318: Dukkhañca kasiraṃ kicchaṃ, nīgho ca byasanaṃ aghaṃ;
anya-e0809n:319: Dabbe tu pāpapuññāni, tīsvākicchaṃ sukhādi ca.
anya-e0809n:321: Bhāgyaṃ niyati bhāgo ca, bhāgadheyyaṃ vidhī’rito;
anya-e0809n:322: Atho uppatti nibbatti, jāti janana mubbhavo.
anya-e0809n:324: Nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ, padaṃ bījaṃ nibandhanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:325: Nidānaṃ pabhavo hetu, sambhavo setu paccayo.
anya-e0809n:327: Kāraṇaṃ yaṃ samāsannaṃ, padaṭṭhānanti taṃ mataṃ;
anya-e0809n:328: Jīvo tu puriso’ttā tha, padhānaṃ pakatitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:330: Pāṇo sarīrī bhūtaṃ vā, satto dehī ca puggalo;
anya-e0809n:334: Rūpaṃ saddo gandha rasā, phasso dhammo ca gocarā;
anya-e0809n:335: Ālambā visayā te chā, rammaṇā lambaṇāni ca.
anya-e0809n:351: Kaḷāro kapilo nīla, pīte tha rocanappabhe;
anya-e0809n:352: Piṅgo pisaṅgo pyathavā, kaḷārādī tu piṅgale.
anya-e0809n:358: Naccaṃ naṭṭañca naṭanaṃ, nattanaṃ lāsanaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:359: Naccaṃ tu vāditaṃ gīta, miti nāṭumidaṃ tayaṃ.
anya-e0809n:364: Siṅgāro karuṇo vīra, bbhuta hassa bhayānakā;
anya-e0809n:365: Santo bībhaccha ruddāni, nava nāṭyarasā ime.
anya-e0809n:367: Posassa nāriyaṃ pose, itthiyā saṅgamaṃ pati;
anya-e0809n:374: Bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ bhāsā, vohāro vacanaṃ vaco;
anya-e0809n:375: Utti vācā girā vāṇī, bhāratī kathitā kathā (katthaci) vacī.
anya-e0809n:381: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṃ budho.
anya-e0809n:383: Iru nārī yaju sāma, miti vedā tayo siyuṃ;
anya-e0809n:384: Ete eva tayī nārī, vedo manto sutitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:386: Aṭṭhako vāmako vāma, devo caṅgīraso bhagu;
anya-e0809n:387: Yamadaggi ca vāsiṭṭho, bhāradvājo ca kassapo;
anya-e0809n:390: Kappo byākaraṇaṃ joti, satthaṃ sikkhā nirutti ca;
anya-e0809n:396: Vitaṇḍasatthaṃ viññeyyaṃ, yaṃ taṃ lokāyataṃ iti;
anya-e0809n:397: Keṭubhaṃ tu kriyākappa, vikappo kavinaṃ hito.
anya-e0809n:402: Saññā, khyā, vhā samaññā cā, bhidhānaṃ nāma mavhayo;
anya-e0809n:405: Pañho tīsva nuyogo ca, pucchā pyatha nidassanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:408: Samā saṅkhepa saṃhārā, samāso saṅgaho pyatha;
anya-e0809n:411: Vohāro tu vivādo tha, sapanaṃ sapathopi ca;
anya-e0809n:416: Katthanā ca silāghā ca, vaṇṇanā ca nuti tthuti.
anya-e0809n:418: Thomanañca thomanaṃ vā (katthaci thomanaṃ thomanā dviliṅge) pasaṃsātha, kekā nādo sikhaṇḍinaṃ;
anya-e0809n:422: Pariyāyo vevacanaṃ, sākacchā tu ca saṃkathā;
anya-e0809n:426: Khepo nindā tathā kucchā, jigucchā garahā bhave;
anya-e0809n:443: Vitathaṃ tu musā cātha āhataṃ tu musātthakaṃ (katthaci, amarakose), pharusādī tiliṅgikā.
anya-e0809n:445: Sammā byayañcā vitathaṃ, saccaṃ tacchaṃ yathātathaṃ;
anya-e0809n:446: Tabbantā tīsva līkaṃ tva, saccaṃ micchā musā byayaṃ.
anya-e0809n:454: Bindu gambhīra ninnādī, tyeva maṭṭhaṅgiko saro.
anya-e0809n:460: Sarā satta tayo gāmā, cekavīsati mucchanā;
anya-e0809n:463: Usabho dhevato ceva, chajja gandhāra majjhimā;
anya-e0809n:464: Pañcamo ca nisādoti, satte’te gaditā sarā.
anya-e0809n:466: Nadanti usabhaṃ gāvo, turagā dhevataṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n:467: Chajjaṃ mayūrā gandhāra, majā koñcā ca majjhimaṃ.
anya-e0809n:473: Saresu tesu pacceke, tisso tisso hi mucchanā;
anya-e0809n:474: Siyuṃ tatheva tānāni ṭhānāni (bahūsu), satta satteva labbhare.
anya-e0809n:476: Tisso duve catasso ca, catasso kamato sare;
anya-e0809n:477: Tisso duve catassoti, dvāvīsati sutī siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n:479: Uccatare rave tāro, thābyatte madhure kalo;
anya-e0809n:480: Gambhīre tu rave mando, tārādī tīsvatho kale;
anya-e0809n:484: Vīṇā ca vallakī satta, tantī sā parivādinī;
anya-e0809n:498: Ātojjaṃ tu ca vādittaṃ, vāditaṃ vajja muccate.
anya-e0809n:509: So tvā modo dūragāmī, vissantā tīsvito paraṃ.
anya-e0809n:511: Iṭṭhagandho ca surabhi, sugandho ca sugandhi ca;
anya-e0809n:512: Pūtigandhi tu duggandho, tha vissaṃ āmagandhi yaṃ.
anya-e0809n:517: Kasāvo nitthiyaṃ titto, madhuro lavaṇo ime;
anya-e0809n:518: Ambilo kaṭuko ceti, cha rasā tabbatī tisu.
anya-e0809n:522: Nayanaṃ tvakkhi nettañca, locanaṃ ca’cchi cakkhu ca.
anya-e0809n:524: Sotaṃ saddaggaho kaṇṇo, savanaṃ suti natthu tu;
anya-e0809n:525: Nāsā ca nāsikā ghānaṃ, jivhātu rasanā bhave.
anya-e0809n:527: Sarīraṃ vapu gattañcā, ttabhāvo bondi viggaho;
anya-e0809n:528: Dehaṃ vā purise kāyo, thiyaṃ tanu kaḷevaraṃ.
anya-e0809n:530: Cittaṃ ceto mano nitthī, viññāṇaṃ hadayaṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n:531: Mānasaṃ dhī tu paññā ca, buddhi medhā mati muti.
anya-e0809n:533: Bhūrī mantā ca paññāṇaṃ, ñāṇaṃ vijjā ca yoni ca;
anya-e0809n:537: Sampajaññaṃ tu nepakkaṃ, vedayitaṃ tu vedanā.
anya-e0809n:541: Ekaggatā tu samatho, avikkhepo samādhi ca.
anya-e0809n:543: Ussāhā’ tappa paggāhā, vāyāmo ca parakkamo;
anya-e0809n:544: Padhānaṃ vīriyaṃ cehā, uyyāmo ca dhiti tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:549: Ussoḷhī tva dhimattehā, sati tva nussati tthiya;
anya-e0809n:550: Lajjā hirī samānā tha, ottappaṃ pāpabhīrutā.
anya-e0809n:556: Dayā’ nukampā kāruññaṃ, karuṇā ca anuddayā;
anya-e0809n:557: Thiyaṃ veramaṇī ceva, viratyā’ rati cāpyatha.
anya-e0809n:559: Titikkhā khanti khamanaṃ, khamā mettā tu metya’tha;
anya-e0809n:560: Dassanaṃ diṭṭhi laddhitthī, siddhanto samayo bhave.
anya-e0809n:562: Taṇhā ca tasiṇā ejā, jālinī ca visattikā;
anya-e0809n:563: Chando jaṭā nikantyā’sā, sibbinī bhavanetti ca.
anya-e0809n:565: Abhijjhā vanatho vānaṃ, lobho rāgo ca ālayo;
anya-e0809n:566: Pihā manoratho icchā, bhilāso kāma dohaḷā;
anya-e0809n:567: Ākaṅkhā ruci vuttā sā, tvadhikā lālasā dvisu.
anya-e0809n:569: Veraṃ virodho viddeso, doso ca paṭighañca vā;
anya-e0809n:573: Baddhavera mupanāho, siyā soko tu socanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:576: Bhītitthi bhaya muttāso, bheravaṃ tu mahabbhayaṃ;
anya-e0809n:579: Ghoraṃ paṭibhayaṃ bhesmaṃ, bhayaṅkara mime tīsu.
anya-e0809n:581: Issā usūyā maccheraṃ, tu macchariya maccharaṃ;
anya-e0809n:582: Moho’vijjā tathā’ñāṇaṃ, māno vidhā ca unnati.
anya-e0809n:584: Uddhacca muddhaṭaṃ cātha uddhavaṃuddhaṃ dhāvati citta metenāti uddhavaṃ (ṭīkā), tāpo kukkuccameva ca;
anya-e0809n:588: Dveḷhakaṃ vicikicchā ca, kaṅkhā saṅkā vimatyapi.
anya-e0809n:591: Nicchayo niṇṇayo vutto, paṭiññā tu paṭissavo.
anya-e0809n:594: Parābhavo pya’ vaññā tha, ummādo cittavibbhamo.
anya-e0809n:596: Pemaṃ sineho sneho tha, cittapīḷā visaññitā;
anya-e0809n:599: Vilāso lalitaṃ līlā, hāvo heḷā ca vibbhamo;
anya-e0809n:602: Hasanaṃ hasitaṃ hāso, mando so mihitaṃ sitaṃ;
anya-e0809n:606: Parihāso davo khiḍḍā, keḷi kīḷā ca kīḷitaṃ;
anya-e0809n:607: Niddā tu supinaṃ soppaṃ, middhañca pacalāyikā.
anya-e0809n:609: Thiyaṃ nikati kūṭañca, dambho sāṭhyañca ketavaṃ;
anya-e0809n:610: Sabhāvo tu nissaggo ca, sarūpaṃ pakatitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:621: Vaggā bhūmi, purī, macca, catubbaṇṇa, vanādihi;
anya-e0809n:624: Vasundharā chamā bhūmi, pathavī medanī mahī;
anya-e0809n:625: Ubbī vasumatī go ku, vasudhā dharaṇī dharā;
anya-e0809n:626: Puthavī jagatī bhūrī, bhū ca bhūtadharā’ vanī.
anya-e0809n:628: Khārā tu mattikā ūso, ūsavā tūsaro tisu;
anya-e0809n:634: Pumbahutte kurū sakkā, kosalā magadhā sivī;
anya-e0809n:637: Vaṅgā videhā kambojā, maddā bhagga’ṅga sīhaḷā;
anya-e0809n:640: Loko ca bhuvanaṃ vuttaṃ, deso tu visayo pyatha;
anya-e0809n:644: Saddalo harite dese, tiṇenā, bhinavena hi.
anya-e0809n:651: Raṭṭhaṃ tu vijitañcātha, purise setu āliyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:653: Upāntabhū parisaro, goṭṭhaṃ tu gokulaṃ vajo;
anya-e0809n:654: Maggo pantho patho addhā, añjasaṃ vaṭumaṃ tathā.
anya-e0809n:656: Pajjo pajjā…. (ka.), yanañca padavī, vattanī paddhatitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:657: Tabbhedā jaṅgha, sakaṭa, maggā te ca mahaddhani.
anya-e0809n:662: Suppatho tu supantho ca, uppathaṃ tvapathaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:664: Chattiṃsaparamāṇūna, meko ṇu ca chattiṃsa te;
anya-e0809n:665: Tajjārī tāpi chattiṃsa, rathareṇu chattiṃsa te.
anya-e0809n:667: Likkhātā satta ūkā tā, dhaññamāsoti satta te;
anya-e0809n:668: Satta ṅgula’ mamu dviccha, vidatthi tā duve siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n:670: Ratanaṃ tāni satteva, yaṭṭhi tā vīsatū sabhaṃ;
anya-e0809n:679: Puraṃ nagara mitthī vā, ṭhānīyaṃ puṭabhedanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:680: Thiyaṃ tu rājadhānī rājaṭhānī (ṭī.) ca, khandhāvāro bhave tha ca.
anya-e0809n:682: Sākhānagara maññatra, yaṃ taṃ mūlapurā puraṃ;
anya-e0809n:683: Bārāṇasī ca sāvatthi, vesālī mithilā, ḷavī.
anya-e0809n:685: Kosambu, jjeniyo takka, silā campā ca sāgalaṃ;
anya-e0809n:686: Susumāragiraṃ saṃsumāra (ṭīkā) rāja, gahaṃ kapilavatthu ca.
anya-e0809n:691: Racchā ca visikhā vuttā, rathikā vīthi cāpyatha;
anya-e0809n:692: Byūho racchā anibbiddhā, nibbiddhā tu pathaddhi ca.
anya-e0809n:694: Catukkaṃ caccare magga, sandhi siṅghāṭakaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:695: Pākāro varaṇo cātha, udāpo uddāpa, uddāpa upakārikā.
anya-e0809n:697: Kuṭṭaṃ tu bhitti nārī tha, gopuraṃ dvārakoṭṭhako;
anya-e0809n:698: Esikā indakhīlo ca, aṭṭo tvaṭṭālako bhave.
anya-e0809n:700: Toraṇaṃ tu bahidvāraṃ, parikhātu ca dīghikā;
anya-e0809n:701: Mandiraṃ sadanā, gāraṃ, nikāyo nilayā, layo.
anya-e0809n:706: Okaṃ sālā khayo vāso, thiyaṃ kuṭi vasatya’pi;
anya-e0809n:707: Gehañcā, nitthi sadumaṃ, cetiyā, yatanāni tu.
anya-e0809n:709: Pāsādo ceva yūpo tha, muṇḍacchado ca hammiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:716: Sabhāyañca sabhā cātha, maṇḍapaṃ vā janālayo;
anya-e0809n:729: Gabbho ovarako vāsā, gāraṃ tu sayaniggahaṃ.
anya-e0809n:731: Itthāgāraṃ tu orodho, suddhanto’ ntepurampi ca;
anya-e0809n:738: Ālokasandhi vutto tha, laṅgī’tthī paligho bhave;
anya-e0809n:741: Chadanaṃ paṭalaṃ chadda, majiraṃ caccaro, ṅgaṇaṃ;
anya-e0809n:744: Piṭṭhasaṅghāṭakaṃ dvāra, bāhā kūṭaṃ tu kaṇṇikā;
anya-e0809n:745: Dvārañca paṭihāro tha, ummāro dehanī, tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:747: Eḷako indakhīlo tha, thambho thūṇo pumitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:748: Pāṭikā, ḍḍhendupāsāṇe, giñjakā tu ca iṭṭhakā.
anya-e0809n:756: Saṅghāto pakkhapāso ca, mandiraṅgā tulā api;
anya-e0809n:757: Thiyaṃ sammujjanī ceva, sammajjanī ca sodhanī.
anya-e0809n:760: Atho kacavaro, klāpo, saṅkāro ca kasambupi.
anya-e0809n:762: Gharādibhūmi taṃ vatthu, gāmo saṃvasatho tha so;
anya-e0809n:763: Pākaṭo nigamo bhoga, maccādibhyo dhi tūdito ‘adhibhū’ti īrito kathito (ṭī.).
anya-e0809n:770: Manusso mānuso macco, mānavo manujo naro;
anya-e0809n:774: Budho vidvā vibhāvī ca, santo sappañña kovidā;
anya-e0809n:775: Dhīmā sudhī kavi byatto, vicakkhaṇo visārado.
anya-e0809n:777: Medhāvī matimā pañño, viññū ca vidūro vidū;
anya-e0809n:778: Dhīro vipassī dosaññū, buddho ca dabba viddasu.
anya-e0809n:780: Itthī sīmantinī nārī, thī vadhū vanitā, ṅganā;
anya-e0809n:781: Pamadā sundarī kantā, ramaṇī dayitā, balā.
anya-e0809n:783: Mātugāmo ca mahilā, lalanā bhīru kāminī;
anya-e0809n:784: Kumārikā tu kaññā tha, yuvatī taruṇī bhave.
anya-e0809n:788: Dhavatthinī tu saṅketaṃ, yāti yā sā, bhisārikā.
anya-e0809n:791: Rūpūpajīvinī vesī, kulaṭā tu ca bandhakī.
anya-e0809n:797: Vijātā tu pasūtā ca, jātāpaccā pasūtikā.
anya-e0809n:799: Dūtī sañcārikā dāsī, tu ceṭī kuṭadhārikā;
anya-e0809n:800: Vāruṇī, kkhaṇikā tulyā, khattiyānī tu khattiyā.
anya-e0809n:802: Dāro jāyā kalattañca, gharaṇī bhariyā piyā,
anya-e0809n:805: Sakhī tvā’lī vayassā tha, jārī cevā’ticārinī;
anya-e0809n:806: Pume tū’tu rajo pupphaṃ, utunī tu rajassalā.
anya-e0809n:811: Dhavotu sāmiko bhattā, kanto pati varo piyo;
anya-e0809n:819: Jāyāpatī janipatī, jayampatī tu dampatī dampatīti padaṃ pulliṅga bahuvacanantaṃ ikārantaṃ, tudampati (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n:820: Atha vassavaro vutto, paṇḍako ca napuṃsakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:822: Bandhavo bandhu sajano, sagotto ñāti ñātako;
anya-e0809n:826: Amma, mbā jananī mātā, janetti janikā bhave;
anya-e0809n:836: Nattā vutto paputto tha, sāmibhātā tu devaro;
anya-e0809n:844: Sodariyo sagabbho ca, sodaro sahajo pyatha;
anya-e0809n:845: Mātāpitū te pitaro, puttā tu puttadhītaro.
anya-e0809n:848: Bālattaṃ bālatā bālyaṃ, yobbaññaṃtu ca yobbanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:850: Sukkā tu palitaṃ kesā, dayo tha jaratā jarā;
anya-e0809n:851: Puthuko pillako chāpo, kumāro bāla potakā.
anya-e0809n:855: Taruṇo ca vayaṭṭho ca, daharo ca yuvā susu;
anya-e0809n:858: Mahallako ca vuddho ca, thero jiṇṇo ca jiṇṇako;
anya-e0809n:859: Aggajo pubbajo jeṭṭho, kaniyo kaniṭṭho nujo.
anya-e0809n:863: Sīso’ttamaṅgāni siro, muddhā ca matthako bhave;
anya-e0809n:864: Keso tu kuntalo vālo, ttamaṅgaruha muddhajā.
anya-e0809n:873: Sīmanto tu mato nāri, kesamajjhamhi paddhati.
anya-e0809n:875: Lomaṃ tanuruhaṃ romaṃ, pamhaṃ pakhuma makkhigaṃ;
anya-e0809n:876: Massu vuttaṃ pumamukhe, bhū tvitthī bhamuko bhamu.
anya-e0809n:879: Vadanaṃ tu mukhaṃ tuṇḍaṃ, vattaṃ lapana mānanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:881: Dvijo lapanajo danto, dasano radano rado;
anya-e0809n:885: Gaṇḍo kapolo hanvitthī gaṇḍatthī (ṭī.) hanvatthī=hanu+itthī; hana+u (ṇvādi),
anya-e0809n:888: Galo ca kaṇṭho gīvā ca, kandharā ca sirodharā;
anya-e0809n:890: Aṅkitā tīhi lekhāhi, kambugīvā thavā matā.
anya-e0809n:892: Aṃso nitthī bhujasiro, khandho tassandhi jattu taṃ;
anya-e0809n:893: Bāhumūlaṃ tu kaccho, dho, tva’ssa passa manitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:895: Bāhu bhujādvīsu bāhā, hattho tu kara pāṇayo;
anya-e0809n:899: Karasākhā, ṅgulī tā tu, pañca, ṅguṭṭho ca tajjanī;
anya-e0809n:900: Majjhimā nāmikā cāpi, kaniṭṭhā’ti kamā siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n:905: Ratanaṃ kukku hattho tha, pume karapuṭo,ñjali;
anya-e0809n:906: Karajo tu nakho nitthī, khaṭako muṭṭhi ca dvīsu.
anya-e0809n:911: Uro ca hadayaṃ cātha, thano kuca payodharā;
anya-e0809n:912: Cūcukaṃ tu thanaggasmiṃ, piṭṭhaṃ tu piṭṭhi nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:914: Majjho’nitthī vilaggo ca, majjhimaṃ kucchi catukkaṃ udare; 944-gāthāpi passitabbā tu dvisu;
anya-e0809n:917: Jaghanaṃ tu nitambo ca, soṇī ca kaṭi nāriyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:924: Asuci sambhavo sukkaṃ, pāyu tu purise gudaṃ;
anya-e0809n:925: Vā pume gūtha karīsa, vaccāni ca malaṃ chakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:927: Uccāro mīḷha mukkāro, passāvo mutta muccate;
anya-e0809n:930: Dvīsvadho nābhiyā vatthi, ucchaṅga’ṅkā tu’bho pume;
anya-e0809n:931: Ūru satthi pume ūru, pabbaṃ tu jāṇu jaṇṇu ca.
anya-e0809n:933: Gopphako pādagaṇṭhipi, pume tu paṇhi pāsaṇi;
anya-e0809n:934: Pādaggaṃ papado pādo, tu pado caraṇañca vā.
anya-e0809n:937: Paṇḍake aṭṭhi dhātvitthī, galantaṭṭhi tu akkhako.
anya-e0809n:939: Kapparo tu kapālaṃ vā, kaṇḍarā tu mahāsirā;
anya-e0809n:940: Pume nhāru citthī sirā, dhamanī tha rasaggasā.
anya-e0809n:943: Tiliṅgikaṃ tu vallūra, muttattaṃ atha lohitaṃ.
anya-e0809n:945: Rudhiraṃ soṇitaṃ rattaṃ, lālā kheḷo elā bhave;
anya-e0809n:946: Purise māyu pittañca, semho nitthī silesumo.
anya-e0809n:948: Vasā vilīnasneho tha, medo ceva vapā bhave;
anya-e0809n:949: Ākappo veso nepacchaṃ, maṇḍanaṃ tu pasādhanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:960: Kaṅkaṇaṃ karabhūsā tha, kiṅkiṇī kiṃkaṇī kiṃ kaṇikā (ka.) khuddaghaṇṭikā;
anya-e0809n:961: Aṅgulīyaka maṅgulyā, bharaṇaṃ, sākkharaṃ tu taṃ.
anya-e0809n:971: Cela macchādanaṃ vatthaṃ, vāso vasana maṃsukaṃ;
anya-e0809n:972: Ambarañca paṭo nitthī, dussaṃ colo ca sāṭako.
anya-e0809n:974: Khomaṃ dukūlaṃ koseyyaṃ, pattuṇṇaṃ kambalo ca vā;
anya-e0809n:975: Sāṇaṃ koṭamburaṃ bhaṅga, ntyādi vatthantaraṃ mataṃ.
anya-e0809n:980: Uttarīya matho vattha, mahatanti mataṃ navaṃ;
anya-e0809n:981: Nantakaṃ kappaṭo jiṇṇa, vasanaṃ tu paṭaccaraṃ.
anya-e0809n:983: Kañcuko vāravāṇaṃ vā, tha vatthāvayave dasā;
anya-e0809n:989: Arahaddhajo ca kāsāya, kāsāvāni ca cīvaraṃ;
anya-e0809n:992: Phala,ttaca, kimi, romā, nyetā vatthassa yoniyo;
anya-e0809n:993: Phālaṃ kappāsikaṃ tīsu, khomādī tu tacabbhavā.
anya-e0809n:995: Koseyyaṃ kimijaṃ, roma, mayaṃ tu kambalaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:1001: Visesako tu tilako, tyūbho nitthī ca cittakaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1002: Candano nitthiyaṃ gandha, sāro malayajo pyatha.
anya-e0809n:1013: Yakkhadhūpo sajjulaso, takkolaṃ tu ca kolakaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1014: Kosaphala matho jāti, kosaṃ jātiphalaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:1017: Alattako yāvako ca, lākhā jatu napuṃsake.
anya-e0809n:1019: Sirivāso tu sarala, ddavo’ ñjanaṃ tu kajjalaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1023: Mālā mālyaṃ pupphadāme pupphaṃ dāmaṃ (ka.), bhāvitaṃ vāsitaṃ tisu.
anya-e0809n:1026: Seyyā ca sayanaṃ senaṃ, pallaṅko tu ca mañcako.
anya-e0809n:1033: Bibbohanaṃ co’ padhānaṃ, pīṭhikā pīṭha māsanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1034: Kocchaṃ tu bhaddapīṭhe thā, sandī pīṭhantare matā.
anya-e0809n:1040: Ghanapupphaṃ paṭalikā, setaṃ tu paṭikā pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1046: Kaṭṭissaṃ koseyyaṃ ratana, parisibbita mattharaṇaṃ kamā;
anya-e0809n:1049: Dīpo padīpo pajjoto, pume tvādāsa dappaṇā;
anya-e0809n:1050: Geṇḍuko kaṇḍuko tāla, vaṇṭaṃ tu bījanītthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1052: Caṅkoṭako karaṇḍo ca, samuggo sampuṭo bhave;
anya-e0809n:1055: Vivāho payamā pāṇi, ggaho pariṇayo pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1058: Khujjo ca gaṇḍulo rassa, vāmanā tu lakuṇḍako;
anya-e0809n:1063: Kuṇī hatthādivaṅko ca, valiro tu ca kekaro.
anya-e0809n:1073: Ātaṅko āmayo byādhi, gado rogo rujāpi ca;
anya-e0809n:1079: Ñeyyaṃ tva’ru vaṇo nitthī, phoṭo tu piḷakā bhave.
anya-e0809n:1081: Pubbo pūyo tha rattāti, sāro pakkhandikā pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1085: Kaṇḍū kaṇḍūti kaṇḍūyā, khajju kaṇḍūvanaṃ pyatha.
anya-e0809n:1087: Pāmaṃ vitacchikā kacchu, sotho tu sayathū’dito;
anya-e0809n:1091: Visūcikā iti mahā, vireko tha bhagandalo bhagandaro (ka.).
anya-e0809n:1093: Meho jaro kāsa sāsā, kuṭṭhaṃ sūlāmayantarā;
anya-e0809n:1094: Vutto vejjo bhisakko ca, rogahārī tikicchako.
anya-e0809n:1097: Bhesajja magado ceva, bhesajaṃ mo’sadhaṃ pyatha.
anya-e0809n:1105: Kulaṃ vaṃso ca santānā, bhijanā gotta manvayo;
anya-e0809n:1106: Thiyaṃ santatya tho vaṇṇā, cattāro khattiyādayo.
anya-e0809n:1110: Rājā bhūpati bhūpālo, patthivo ca narādhipo.
anya-e0809n:1118: Pume licchavi vajjī ca, sakyo tu sākiyo tha ca;
anya-e0809n:1119: Bhaddakaccānā bhaddā kaccānā (ṭī.) rāhula, mātā bimbā yasodharā.
anya-e0809n:1128: Vaḷañje ca gahapati, mahāsālā dhane siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n:1131: Sajīvo sacivā, macco, senānī tu camūpati.
anya-e0809n:1137: Kañcukī sovidallo ca, anujīvī tu sevako.
anya-e0809n:1143: Amitto ripu verī ca, sapattā rāti satva’ri; (Sattu+ari)
anya-e0809n:1147: Viddesī ca diso diṭṭho,thā nurodho nuvattanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1149: Mitto nitthī vayasso ca, sahāyo suhajjo (ṭī.) suhado sakhā;
anya-e0809n:1153: Dūto tu sandesaharo, gaṇako tu muhuttiko.
anya-e0809n:1155: Lekhako lipikāro ca, vaṇṇo tu akkharo pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1156: Bhedo daṇḍo sāma dānā, nyupāyā caturo ime.
anya-e0809n:1158: Upajāpotu bhedo ca, daṇḍo tu sāhasaṃ damo;
anya-e0809n:1160: Sāmya’ macco sakhā koso, duggañca vijitaṃ balaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1163: Pabhāvu’ssāha, mantānaṃ, vasā tisso hi sattiyo;
anya-e0809n:1167: Manto ca mantanaṃ so tu, catukkaṇṇo dvigocaro;
anya-e0809n:1168: Tigocaro tu chakkaṇṇo, rahassaṃ guyha muccate.
anya-e0809n:1170: Tīsu vivitta vijana, channā, raho raho byayaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1175: Āṇā ca sāsanaṃ ñeyyaṃ, uddānaṃ tu ca bandhanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1177: Āgu vutta mantu (ka.) maparādho, karo tu bali muccate;
anya-e0809n:1178: Puṇṇapatto tuṭṭhidāyo, upadā tu ca pābhataṃ.
anya-e0809n:1181: Suṅkaṃ tvanitthī gumbādi, deyye thā’yo dhanāgamo.
anya-e0809n:1183: Ātapattaṃ tathā chattaṃ, raññaṃ tu hemamāsanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1184: Sīhāsanaṃ atho vāḷa, bījanītthī ca cāmaraṃ.
anya-e0809n:1186: Khaggo ca chatta muṇhīsaṃ, pādukā vālabījanī;
anya-e0809n:1192: Kuñjaro vāraṇo hatthī, mātaṅgo dvirado gajo;
anya-e0809n:1196: Kāḷāvaka gaṅgeyyā, paṇḍara tambā ca piṅgalo gandho;
anya-e0809n:1200: Kalabho ceva bhiṅkotha, pabhinno matta gajjitā;
anya-e0809n:1201: Hatthighaṭā tu gajatā, hatthīnī tu kareṇukā.
anya-e0809n:1212: Majjhamhi bandhanaṃ kacchā, kappano tu kuthādayo.
anya-e0809n:1214: Opavayho rājavayho, sajjito tu ca kappito;
anya-e0809n:1217: Tuttaṃ tu kaṇṇamūlamhi, matthakamhi tu aṅkuso;
anya-e0809n:1230: Ghoṭako tu khaḷuṅko tha, javano ca javādhiko;
anya-e0809n:1231: Mukhādhānaṃ khalīno vā, kasā tva ssābhitāḷinī.
anya-e0809n:1233: Kusā tu nāsarajjumhi, vaḷavā’ssā khuro saphaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1234: Puccha manitthī naṅguṭṭhaṃ, vālahattho ca vāladhi.
anya-e0809n:1236: Sandano ca ratho phussa, ratho tu naraṇāya so;
anya-e0809n:1240: Sivikā yāpyayānañcā, nitthī tu sakaṭo pya’naṃ (sakaṭo pi+anaṃ);
anya-e0809n:1241: Cakkaṃ rathaṅga mākhyātaṃ, tassanto nemi nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1243: Tammajjhe piṇḍikā nābhi, kubbaro tu yugandharo;
anya-e0809n:1246: Dhuro mukhe rathassaṅgā, tva kkho pakkharaādayo;
anya-e0809n:1249: Rathacārī tu sūto ca, pājitā ceva sārathī;
anya-e0809n:1253: Padāti pattī tu pume, padago padiko mato;
anya-e0809n:1254: Sannāho kaṅkaṭo vammaṃ, kavaco vā uracchado.
anya-e0809n:1256: Jālikā tha ca sannaddho, sajjo ca vammiko bhave;
anya-e0809n:1260: Javano turito vegī, jetabbaṃ jeyya muccate.
anya-e0809n:1262: Sūra vīrā tu vikkanto, sahāyo nucaro samā;
anya-e0809n:1263: Sannaddhappabhutī tīsu, pātheyyaṃ tu ca sambalaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1265: Vāhinī dhajinī senā, camū cakkaṃ balaṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n:1277: Dhūlīkatesu senāya, yantiyā kkhobhanī akkhobhiṇī (ka.) tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1279: Sampatti sampadā lakkhī, sirī vipatti āpadā;
anya-e0809n:1280: Athā vudhañca āyudhantipi pāṭho heti’tthī, satthaṃ paharaṇaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:1288: Issāso dhanu kodaṇḍaṃ, cāpo nitthī sarāsanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1292: Vāṇo kaṇḍa musu dvīsu, khurappo urappo (ka.) tejanā’sanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1293: Tūṇītthiyaṃ kalāpo ca, tūṇo tūṇīra vāṇadhi.
anya-e0809n:1295: Pakkho tu vājo diddho tu, visappito saro bhave;
anya-e0809n:1298: Maṇḍalaggo tu nettiṃso, asi khaggo ca sāyako;
anya-e0809n:1301: Kheṭakaṃ phalakaṃ cammaṃ, illī tu karapālikā;
anya-e0809n:1302: Churikā satya’siputtī, laguḷo tu ca muggaro.
anya-e0809n:1304: Sallo nitthi saṅku pume, vāsī tu tacchanītthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1307: Kaṇayo bhindivāḷo ca, cakkaṃ kunto gadā tathā;
anya-e0809n:1311: Niyyānaṃ gamanaṃ yātrā, paṭṭhānañca gamo gati;
anya-e0809n:1312: Cuṇṇo paṃsu rajo ceva, dhūlī’tthī reṇu ca dvisu.
anya-e0809n:1314: Māgadho madhuko vutto, vandī tu thutipāṭhako;
anya-e0809n:1318: Ketu dhajo paṭākā ca, kadalī ketanaṃ pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1321: Balaṃ thāmo sahaṃ satti, vikkamo tvatisūratā;
anya-e0809n:1322: Raṇe jitassa yaṃ pānaṃ, jayapānanti taṃ mataṃ.
anya-e0809n:1324: Saṅgāmo sampahāro cā, nitthiyaṃ samaraṃ raṇaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1327: Bhaṇḍanaṃ tu vivādo ca, viggaho kalaha medhagā;
anya-e0809n:1331: Uppādo uppāto (ka.)1027-gāthā passitabbā bhūtavikati, yā subhāsubhasūcikā;
anya-e0809n:1334: Nibbuddhaṃ niyuddhaṃ (ka.) mallayuddhamhi, jayo tu vijayo bhave;
anya-e0809n:1338: Hiṃsanaṃ saraṇaṃ hiṃsā, vadho sasana ghātanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1341: Nidhano nitthiyaṃ nāso, kālo’nto cavanaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:1351: Kārā tu bandhanāgāraṃ, kāraṇā tu ca yātanā.
anya-e0809n:1354: Brahmabandhu dvijo vippo, brahmā bhovādī brāhmaṇo;
anya-e0809n:1358: Brahmacārī gahaṭṭho ca, vanappattho ca bhikkhuti;
anya-e0809n:1362: Upajjhāyo upajjhā thā, cariyo nissayadādiko nissayadāyako (ṭī.).
anya-e0809n:1364: Upanīyā thavā pubbaṃ, veda majjhāpaye dvijo;
anya-e0809n:1365: Yo saṅgaṃ sarahassañcā, cariyo brāhmaṇesu so.
anya-e0809n:1368: Yāgo tu katu yañño tha, vedītthī bhū parikkhatā.
anya-e0809n:1370: Assamedho ca purisa, medho ceva niraggaḷo;
anya-e0809n:1371: Sammāpāso vājapeyya, miti yāgā mahā ime.
anya-e0809n:1375: Parisā sabhā samajjā ca, tathā samiti saṃsado.
anya-e0809n:1377: Catasso parisā bhikkhu, bhikkhunī ca upāsakā;
anya-e0809n:1378: Upāsikāyoti imā, thavā ṭṭha parisā siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n:1384: Vedāna mādibhūtaṃ sā, sāvittī tipadaṃ siyā.
anya-e0809n:1386: Habyapāke caru mato, sujā tu homadabbiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1387: Paramannaṃ tu pāyāso, habyaṃ tu havi kathyate.
anya-e0809n:1389: Yūpo thūṇāyaṃ nimmantya, dārumhi tva’raṇī dvisu;
anya-e0809n:1395: Pañca mahāpariccāgo, vutto seṭṭha, dhanassa ca;
anya-e0809n:1396: Vasena putta dārānaṃ, rajjassa’ ṅgāna meva ca.
anya-e0809n:1398: Annaṃ pānaṃ gharaṃ vatthaṃ, yānaṃ mālā vilepanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1399: Gandho seyyā padīpeyyaṃ, dānavatthū siyuṃ dasa.
anya-e0809n:1402: Pitudānaṃ tu nivāpo, saddhaṃ tu taṃva sātthato.
anya-e0809n:1404: Pume atithi āgantu, pāhunā vesikā pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1405: Aññattha gantu micchanto, gamiko thā ggha magghiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1416: Upāsanaṃ tu sussūsā, sā pāricariyā bhave.
anya-e0809n:1418: Mona mabhāsanaṃ tuṇhī, bhāvo tha paṭipāṭi sā;
anya-e0809n:1421: Tapo ca saṃyamo sīlaṃ, niyamo tu vatañca vā;
anya-e0809n:1427: Yo pāpehi upāvatto, vāso saddhiṃ guṇehi so;
anya-e0809n:1431: Vācaṃyamo tu muni ca, tāpaso tu isī rito.
anya-e0809n:1440: Aññā tu arahattañca, thūpo tu cetiyaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:1441: Dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko ca, ānando dve samā tha ca.
anya-e0809n:1445: Bhikkhupi sāmaṇero ca, sikkhamānā ca bhikkhunī;
anya-e0809n:1448: Patto ticīvaraṃ kāya, bandhanaṃ vāsi sūci ca;
anya-e0809n:1451: Sāmaṇero ca samaṇu, ddeso cātha digambaro;
anya-e0809n:1452: Aceḷako nigaṇṭho ca, jaṭilo tu jaṭādharo.
anya-e0809n:1457: Pavitto payato pūto, cammaṃ tu ajinaṃ pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1467: Vesso ca vesiyāno tha, jīvanaṃ vutti jīvikā;
anya-e0809n:1473: Khettājīvo kassako tha, khettaṃ kedāra muccate;
anya-e0809n:1476: Dāttaṃ lavitta masitaṃ ‘‘asita’’ saddo puṃnapuṃsake-1005-gāthā passitabbā, patodo tutta pājanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1477: Yottaṃ tu rajju rasmitthī, phālo tu kasako bhave.
anya-e0809n:1480: Sammā tu yugakīlasmiṃ, sītā tu halapaddhati.
anya-e0809n:1483: Sāli vīhi ca kudrūso, godhumo varako yavo;
anya-e0809n:1484: Kaṅgūti satta dhaññāni, nīvārādī tu tabbhidā.
anya-e0809n:1489: Atha kaṅgu piyaṅgu’tthī, ummā tu atasī bhave;
anya-e0809n:1490: Kiṭṭhañca sassaṃ dhaññañca viññeyyaṃ (ṭī.), vīhi thambakarī thambhakarī (ka.) rito.
anya-e0809n:1492: Kaṇḍo tu nāḷa matha so, palālaṃ nitthi nipphalo;
anya-e0809n:1493: Bhusaṃ kaliṅgaro cātha, thuso dhaññattace tha ca.
anya-e0809n:1497: Khalo ca dhaññakaraṇaṃ, thambo thambho (ka.) gumbo tiṇādinaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1499: Ayoggo musalo nitthī, kullo suppa manitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1500: Atho’ddhanañca culli’tthī, kilañjo tu kaṭo bhave.
anya-e0809n:1503: Kolambo cātha maṇikaṃ, bhāṇako ca arañjaro.
anya-e0809n:1505: Ghaṭo dvīsu kuṭo nitthī, kumbho kalasa, vārakā;
anya-e0809n:1506: Kaṃso bhuñjanapatto thā, mattaṃ patto ca bhājanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1508: Aṇḍupakaṃ cumbaṭakaṃ, sarāvo tu ca mallako;
anya-e0809n:1512: Mahosadhaṃ tu taṃ sukkhaṃ, maricaṃ tu ca kolakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1515: Dhaññambilaṃ biḷaṅgo tha, lavaṇaṃ loṇa muccate.
anya-e0809n:1517: Sāmuddaṃ sindhavo nitthī, kāḷaloṇaṃ tu ubbhidaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1518: Biḷakaṃ biḷāla (ka.) ceti pañcete, pabhedā lavaṇassa hi.
anya-e0809n:1520: Guḷo ca phāṇitaṃ khaṇḍo, macchaṇḍī sakkharā iti;
anya-e0809n:1523: Lājā siyā’kkhataṃ cātha, dhānā bhaṭṭhayave bhave;
anya-e0809n:1524: Abaddhasattu mantho ca, pūpā’ pūpā tu piṭṭhako.
anya-e0809n:1527: Odaniko ca rasako, sūpo tu byañjanaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:1529: Odano vā kuraṃ bhattaṃ, bhikkhā cā’nna mathā sanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1533: Khajjaṃ tu bhojja leyyāni, peyyanti catudhā’sanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1538: Vighāsādo ca damako, pipāsā tu ca tassanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1541: Udreko ceva uggāro, sohiccaṃ titti tappanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1548: Uttamaṇṇo ca dhaniko, dhamaṇṇo tu iṇāyiko.
anya-e0809n:1550: Uddhāro tu iṇaṃ vuttaṃ, mūlaṃ tu pābhataṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:1556: Saṅkhyāne tu ca saṅkhyeyye, ekatte vīsatādayo;
anya-e0809n:1559: Sataṃ sahassaṃ niyutaṃ nahutaṃ-nayutaṃ (katthaci), lakkhaṃ koṭi pakoṭiyo;
anya-e0809n:1563: Ahahaṃ ababaṃ cevā, ṭaṭaṃ sogandhi kuppalaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1574: Tulā, pattha, ṅguli, vasā, tidhā māna matho siyā.
anya-e0809n:1578: Dve akkhā māsakā pañca, kkhānaṃ dharaṇamaṭṭhakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1580: Suvaṇṇo pañcadharaṇaṃ, nikkhaṃ tvanitthi pañca te;
anya-e0809n:1581: Pādo bhāge catutthe tha, dharaṇāni palaṃ dasa.
anya-e0809n:1583: Tulā palasataṃ cātha, bhāro vīsati tā tulā;
anya-e0809n:1594: Āḷhako nitthiyaṃ tumbho, patthotu nāḷi nāriyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1600: Dabbaṃ vittaṃ sāpateyyaṃ, vasva’ttho vibhavo bhave.
anya-e0809n:1602: Koso hiraññañca katā, kataṃ kañcana, rūpiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1603: Kuppaṃ tadaññaṃ tambādi, rūpiyaṃ dvaya māhataṃ.
anya-e0809n:1605: Suvaṇṇaṃ kanakaṃ jāta, rūpaṃ soṇṇañca kañcanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1606: Satthuvaṇṇo harī kambu, cāru hemañca hāṭakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1608: Tapaniyaṃ hiraññaṃ ta, bbhedā cāmīkarampi ca;
anya-e0809n:1609: Sātakumbhaṃ tathā jambu, nadaṃ siṅgī ca nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1611: Rūpiyaṃ rajataṃ sajjhu, rūpī sajjhaṃ atho vasu;
anya-e0809n:1614: Suvaṇṇaṃ rajataṃ muttā, maṇi veḷuriyāni ca;
anya-e0809n:1617: Lohitaṅko ca paduma, rāgo rattamaṇi pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1618: Vaṃsavaṇṇo veḷuriyaṃ, pavāḷaṃ vā ca viddumo.
anya-e0809n:1620: Masāragallaṃ kabaramaṇi, atha muttā ca muttikaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1621: Rīti rīrī (ṭī.) tthī ārakūṭo vā, amalaṃ tva’bbhakaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:1625: Kāḷatipu tu sīsañca, haritālaṃ tu pītanaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1627: Cinapiṭṭhañca sindūraṃ, atha tūlo tathā picu;
anya-e0809n:1628: Khuddajaṃ tu madhu khuddaṃ, madhucchiṭṭhaṃ tu sitthakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1632: Usabho balībaddho balibadda (ka.) ca, goṇo govasabho vuso.
anya-e0809n:1634: Vuddho jaraggavo so tha, dammo vacchataro samā;
anya-e0809n:1635: Dhuravāhī tu dhorayho, govindo dhikato gavaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1637: Vaho ca khandhadeso tha, kakudho kakudo (ka.) kaku vuccate;
anya-e0809n:1638: Atho visāṇaṃ siṅgañca, rattagāvī tu rohiṇī.
anya-e0809n:1640: Gāvī ca siṅginī go ca, vañjhā tu kathyate vasā;
anya-e0809n:1644: Gomiḷho gomayo nitthī, atho sappi ghataṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:1646: Navuddhaṭaṃ tu nonītaṃ, damimaṇḍaṃ tu matthu ca,
anya-e0809n:1647: Khīraṃ duddhaṃ payo thaññaṃ, takkaṃ tu mathitaṃ pyatha.
anya-e0809n:1649: Khīraṃ dadhi ghataṃ takkaṃ, nonītaṃ pañca gorasā;
anya-e0809n:1650: Urabbho meṇḍa mesā ca, uraṇo avi eḷako.
anya-e0809n:1654: Gadrabho tu kharo vutto, uraṇī tu ajī ajā.
anya-e0809n:1663: Tacchako tantavāyo ca, rajako ca nahāpito;
anya-e0809n:1667: Rathakāro tha suvaṇṇa, kāro nāḷindhamo bhave.
anya-e0809n:1677: Veno vilīvakāro ca, naḷakāro samā tayo;
anya-e0809n:1688: Māyā tu sambarī māyā, kāro tu indajāliko;
anya-e0809n:1690: Orabbhikā sūkarikā, māgavikā te ca sākuṇikā;
anya-e0809n:1691: Hantvā jīvante’ḷaka, sūkara, miga, pakkhino kamato.
anya-e0809n:1695: Vetaniko tu bhatako, kammakaro tha kiṃ karo;
anya-e0809n:1696: Dāso ca ceṭako pesso, bhacco ca paricāriko.
anya-e0809n:1699: Dāsā karamarānīto, ccevaṃ te catudhā siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n:1706: Sapāko ceva caṇḍālo, mātaṅgo sapaco bhave;
anya-e0809n:1711: Sārameyyo ca sunakho, suno soṇo ca kukkuro.
anya-e0809n:1717: Sābandhanaṃ tu gaddūlo, dīpako tu ca cetako;
anya-e0809n:1718: Bandhanaṃ gaṇṭhi pāso tha, vāgurā vākarā (sī. ṭī.) migabandhanī.
anya-e0809n:1720: Thiyaṃ kuveṇī kumīnaṃ, ānayo jāla muccate;
anya-e0809n:1728: Suttaṃ tantu pume tantaṃ, potthaṃ lepyādikammani;
anya-e0809n:1732: Mañjūsā peḷā piṭako, tvitthiyaṃ pacchi peṭako.
anya-e0809n:1735: Upāhano vā pādu’tthī, tabbhedā pādukā pyatha.
anya-e0809n:1742: Tabbhastā gaggarī nārī, sattaṃ tu pipphalaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:1746: Kharo ca kakaco nitthī, sippaṃ kammaṃ kalādikaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1753: Opamma mupamānaṃ cu, pamā bhati tu nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1755: Nibbeso vetanaṃ mūlyaṃ, jūtaṃ tvanitthi ketavaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1758: Pāṭibhogotu paṭibhū, akkho tu pāsako bhave;
anya-e0809n:1759: Pumevā’ ṭṭhapadaṃ aṭṭhāpadaṃ (ṭī. sī.) sāri, phalake tha paṇo, bbhuto.
anya-e0809n:1761: Kiṇṇaṃ tu madirābīje, madhu madhvāsave mataṃ;
anya-e0809n:1762: Madirā vāruṇī majjaṃ, surā bhavo tu merayaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1772: Araññaṃ kānanaṃ dāyo, gahanaṃ vipinaṃ vanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1776: Tarusaṇḍo sa ārāmo, tatho pavana muccate.
anya-e0809n:1781: Panti vīthyā’vali seṇī, pāḷi lekhā tu rāji ca;
anya-e0809n:1782: Pādapo viṭapī rukkho, ago sālo mahīruho.
anya-e0809n:1784: Dumo taru kujo sākhī, gaccho tu khuddapādapo;
anya-e0809n:1785: Phalanti ye vinā pupphaṃ, te vuccanti vanappatī.
anya-e0809n:1789: Tīsu vañcyā’phalā cātha, phalino phalavā phalī.
anya-e0809n:1791: Samphullito tu vikaco, phullo vikasito tisu;
anya-e0809n:1792: Siro’ggaṃ sikharo nitthī, sākhā tu kathitā latā.
anya-e0809n:1794: Dalaṃ palāsaṃ chadanaṃ, paṇṇaṃ pattaṃ chado pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1795: Pallavo vā kisalayaṃ, navubbhinne tu aṅkuro.
anya-e0809n:1797: Makulaṃ vā kuṭumalo, khārako tu ca jālakaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1800: Pasavo kusumaṃ pupphaṃ, parāgo pupphajo rajo;
anya-e0809n:1801: Makarando madhu mataṃ, thavako tu ca gocchako.
anya-e0809n:1807: Mallikādī tu kusume, saliṅgā vīhayo phale;
anya-e0809n:1810: Mūla mārabbha sākhanto, khandho bhāgo tarussa tha;
anya-e0809n:1811: Koṭaro nitthiyaṃ rukkha, cchidde kaṭṭhaṃ tu dāru ca.
anya-e0809n:1813: Bundo mūlañca pādo tha, saṅku’tto khāṇunitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1814: Karahāṭaṃ tu kando tha, kaḷīro matthako bhave.
anya-e0809n:1816: Vallarī mañjarī nārī, vallī tu kathitā latā;
anya-e0809n:1817: Thambho gumbo ca akkhandhe, latā virū patāninī.
anya-e0809n:1819: Assattho bodhi ca dvīsu, nigrodho tu vaṭo bhave;
anya-e0809n:1820: Kabiṭṭho ca kapittho ca, yaññaṅgo tu udumbaro.
anya-e0809n:1825: Dantasaṭho ca jambhīro, varaṇo tu kareri ca;
anya-e0809n:1826: Kiṃ suko pālibhaddotha, vañjulo tu ca vetaso.
anya-e0809n:1829: Atho guḷaphalo pīlu, sobhañjano ca siggu ca.
anya-e0809n:1835: Mālūra beluvābillo, punnāgo tu ca kesaro;
anya-e0809n:1836: Sālavo tu ca loddo tha, piyālo sannakaddu ca.
anya-e0809n:1843: Puṇḍarīko ca setambo, selu tu bahuvārako;
anya-e0809n:1844: Sepaṇṇī kāsmirī cātha, kolī ca badarītthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:1852: Kadambo piyako nīpo, bhallī bhallātako tisu;
anya-e0809n:1853: Jhāvuko piculo cātha, tilako khurako bhave.
anya-e0809n:1855: Ciñcā ca tintiṇī cātha, gaddabhaṇḍo kapītano;
anya-e0809n:1859: Niculo mucalindo ca, nīpo tha piyako tathā;
anya-e0809n:1864: Yūpo pūgo (ka.) tu kamuko cātha, paṭṭi lākhāpasādano.
anya-e0809n:1869: Pakiriyo pūtiko tha, rohī rohitako bhave;
anya-e0809n:1870: Eraṇḍo tu ca āmaṇḍo, atha sattuphalā samī.
anya-e0809n:1873: Somavakko tu kadaro, sallotu madano bhave.
anya-e0809n:1875: Athāpi indasālo ca, sallakī khārako siyā;
anya-e0809n:1876: Devadāru bhaddadāru, campeyyo tu ca campako.
anya-e0809n:1882: Nimbo’riṭṭho pucimando, karako tu ca dāḷimo.
anya-e0809n:1884: Saralo pūtikaṭṭhañca, kapilā tu ca siṃsapā;
anya-e0809n:1885: Sāmā piyaṅgu kaṅgupi, sirīso tu ca bhaṇḍilo.
anya-e0809n:1892: Tāpiñcho ca tamālo tha, kuṭajo girimallikā.
anya-e0809n:1894: Indayavo phale tassā, ggimantho kaṇikā bhave;
anya-e0809n:1895: Niguṇṭhi’tthī sinduvāro, tiṇasuññaṃ tiṇasūlaṃ (ṭī.) tu mallikā.
anya-e0809n:1904: Mātuluṅgo bījapūro, ummatto tu ca mātulo.
anya-e0809n:1906: Karamando suseno ca, kundaṃ tu māghya muccate;
anya-e0809n:1914: Japā tu jayasumanaṃ, karīro kakaco bhave;
anya-e0809n:1919: Pūtilatā gaḷocī ca, mubbā madhurasā pyatha.
anya-e0809n:1921: Kapikacchu duphasso tha, mañjiṭṭhā vikasā bhave;
anya-e0809n:1922: Ambaṭṭhā ca tathā pāṭhā, kaṭukā kaṭurohiṇī.
anya-e0809n:1930: Nididdhikā tu byagghī ca, atha nīlī ca nīlinī;
anya-e0809n:1931: Jiñjuko jiñjukā (ka.) ceva guñjā tha, satamūlī satāvarī.
anya-e0809n:1936: Nuhī ceva mahānāmo, muddikā tu madhurasā;
anya-e0809n:1937: Athāpi madhukaṃ yaṭṭhi, madhukāmadhuyaṭṭhikā madhulaṭṭhikā (sī. ṭī.).
anya-e0809n:1939: Vātiṅgaṇo ca bhaṇḍākī, vāttākī brahatī pyatha;
anya-e0809n:1940: Nāgabalā ceva jhasā, lāṅgalī tu ca sāradī.
anya-e0809n:1942: Rambhā ca kadalī moco, kappāsī badarā bhave;
anya-e0809n:1943: Nāgalatā tu tambūlī, aggijālā tu dhātakī.
anya-e0809n:1945: Tivutā tipuṭā cātha, sāmā kāḷā ca kathyate;
anya-e0809n:1946: Atho siṅgī ca usabho, reṇukā kapiḷā bhave.
anya-e0809n:1949: Seleyya’ masmapupphañca, elā tu bahulā bhave.
anya-e0809n:1951: Kuṭṭhañca byādhi kathito, vāneyyaṃ tu kuṭannaṭaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1954: Mūlaṃ pattaṃ kaḷīra’ggaṃ, kandaṃ miñjā phalaṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n:1955: Taco pupphañca chattanti, sākaṃ dasavidhaṃ mataṃ.
anya-e0809n:1959: Jīvanti jīvanī cātha, madhurako ca jīvako.
anya-e0809n:1961: Mahākando ca lasuṇaṃ, palaṇḍu tu sukandako;
anya-e0809n:1962: Paṭolo tittako cātha, bhiṅgarājo ca makkavo.
anya-e0809n:1965: Kāravello tu susavī, tumbyā’lābu ca lābu sā.
anya-e0809n:1967: Eḷālukañca kakkārī, kumbhaṇḍo tu ca vallibho;
anya-e0809n:1970: Mūlako nitthiyaṃ cuccu, tambako ca kalambako;
anya-e0809n:1973: Saddalo ceva dubbā ca, golomī sā sitā bhave;
anya-e0809n:1974: Gundā ca bhaddamuttañca, rasālo tu’cchu veḷu tu.
anya-e0809n:1976: Tacasāro veṇu vaṃso, pabbaṃ tu phalu gaṇṭhiso;
anya-e0809n:1977: Kīcakā te siyuṃ veṇū, ye nadantyā’niladdhutā.
anya-e0809n:1979: Naḷo ca dhamano poṭa, galo tu kāsa mitthi na;
anya-e0809n:1980: Tejano tu saro, mūlaṃ, tū’ sīraṃ bīraṇassa hi.
anya-e0809n:1982: Kuso varahisaṃ dabbo, bhūtiṇakaṃ tu bhūtiṇaṃ;
anya-e0809n:1986: Tālo vibhedikā cātha, khajjurī sindi vuccati;
anya-e0809n:1988: Hintāla, tāla, khajjūrī, nālikerā tatheva ca;
anya-e0809n:1989: Tālī ca ketakī nārī, pūgo ca tiṇapādapāti.
anya-e0809n:1997: Viñjho paṇḍava vaṅkādī, pubbaselo tu co’dayo;
anya-e0809n:2001: Kālakūṭo tikūṭā’ssa, pattho tu sānu nitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2003: Kūṭo vā sikharaṃ siṅgaṃ, papāto tu taṭo bhave;
anya-e0809n:2006: Darī’tthī kandaro dvīsu, leṇaṃ tu gabbharaṃ guhā;
anya-e0809n:2007: Silāpokkharaṇī soṇḍī, kuñjaṃ nikuñja mitthi na.
anya-e0809n:2009: Uddha madhiccakā sela, ssāsannā bhūmyu paccakā;
anya-e0809n:2014: Migindo kesarī sīho, taraccho tu migādano;
anya-e0809n:2015: Byaggho tu puṇḍarīko tha, saddūlo dīpinī’rito.
anya-e0809n:2022: Khagga khaggavisāṇā tu, palāsādo ca gaṇḍako;
anya-e0809n:2025: Makkaṭo vānaro sākhā, migo kapi valīmukho;
anya-e0809n:2029: Siṅgālo sigālo (sī.) jambuko kotthu, bheravo ca sivā pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2030: Biḷāro babbu mañjāro, koko tu ca vako bhave.
anya-e0809n:2037: Hariṇo miga sāraṅgā, mago ajinayoni ca;
anya-e0809n:2041: Eṇeyyo eṇīmigo ca, pampaṭako tu pampako;
anya-e0809n:2042: Vātamigo tu calanī, mūsiko tvā’khu unduro.
anya-e0809n:2045: Ruru raṅku ca nīko ca, sarabhādī migantarā.
anya-e0809n:2048: Migā tu pasavo sīhā, dayo sabbacatuppadā.
anya-e0809n:2050: Lūtā tu lūtikā uṇṇa, nābhi makkaṭako siyā;
anya-e0809n:2053: Godhā kuṇḍo pyatho kaṇṇa, jalūkā satapadyatha;
anya-e0809n:2054: Kalandako kāḷakā tha, nakulo maṅguso bhave.
anya-e0809n:2056: Kakaṇṭako ca saraṭo, kīṭo tu puḷavo kimi;
anya-e0809n:2061: Sakuṇo ca sakunto vi, pataṅgo sakuṇī dvijo.
anya-e0809n:2063: Vakkaṅgo pattayāno ca, patanto nīḷajo bhave;
anya-e0809n:2064: Tabbhedā vaṭṭakā jīva, ñjīvo cakora tittirā.
anya-e0809n:2069: Patattaṃ pekhuṇaṃ pattaṃ, pakkho piñchaṃ chado garu;
anya-e0809n:2070: Aṇḍaṃ tu pakkhibīje tha, nīḷo nitthī kulāvakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2073: Yugaṃ tu yugalaṃ dvandaṃ, yamakaṃ yamalaṃ yamaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2075: Samūho gaṇa saṅghātā, samudāyo ca sañcayo;
anya-e0809n:2076: Sandoho nivaho ogho, visaro nikaro cayo.
anya-e0809n:2078: Kāyo khandho samudayo, ghaṭā samiti saṃhati;
anya-e0809n:2079: Rāsi puñjo samavāyo, pūgo jātaṃ kadambakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2081: Byūho vitāna gumbā ca, kalāpo jāla maṇḍalaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2085: Sajātikānaṃ tu kulaṃ, nikāyo tu sadhamminaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2092: Kalāpī ca sikhī kekī, cūḷā tu ca sikhā bhave.
anya-e0809n:2095: Candako mecako cātha, chappado ca madhubbato.
anya-e0809n:2098: Pārāvato kapoto ca, kakuṭo ca pārevato.
anya-e0809n:2100: Gijjho gaddhotha kulalo, seno byagghīnaso pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2103: Uhuṅkāro ulūko ca, kosiyo vāyasāri ca;
anya-e0809n:2104: Kāko tva’riṭṭho dhaṅko ca, balipuṭṭho ca vāyaso.
anya-e0809n:2111: Suvo tu kīro ca suko, tambacūḷo tu kukkuṭo.
anya-e0809n:2113: Vanakukkuṭo ca nijjivho, atha koñcā ca kuntanī;
anya-e0809n:2114: Cakkavāko tu cakkavho, sāraṅgotu ca cātako.
anya-e0809n:2121: Lohapiṭṭho tathā kaṅko, khañjarīṭo tu khañjano;
anya-e0809n:2122: Kalaviṅko tu cāṭako, dindibho tu kikī bhave.
anya-e0809n:2131: Sūcimukho ca makaso, cīrī tu jhallikā jhillikā (ka.) tha ca;
anya-e0809n:2132: Jatukā jinapattā tha, haṃso setacchado bhave.
anya-e0809n:2141: Randhaṃ tu vivaraṃ chiddaṃ, kuharaṃ susiraṃ bilaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2143: Susi’tthī chiggalaṃ sobbhaṃ, sacchidde susiraṃ tisu;
anya-e0809n:2144: Thiyaṃ tu kāsu āvāṭo, sapparājā tu vāsukī.
anya-e0809n:2151: Silutto gharasappo tha, nīlasappo silābhu ca.
anya-e0809n:2154: Sarīsapo phaṇī sappā, lagaddā bhogi pannagā.
anya-e0809n:2156: Dvijivho urago vāḷo, dīgho ca dīghapiṭṭhiko;
anya-e0809n:2157: Pādūdaro visadharo, bhogo tu phaṇino tanu.
anya-e0809n:2159: Āsī’tthī sappadāṭhā tha, nimmoko kañcuko samā;
anya-e0809n:2160: Visaṃ tva’nitthī garaḷaṃ, tabbhedā vā halāhalo.
anya-e0809n:2164: Nirayo duggati’tthī ca, narako, so mahā’ṭṭhadhā;
anya-e0809n:2168: Thiyaṃ vetaraṇī loha, kumbhī tattha jalāsayā;
anya-e0809n:2177: Thevo tu bindu phusitaṃ, bhamo tu jalaniggamo.
anya-e0809n:2179: Āpo payo jalaṃ vāri, pānīyaṃ salilaṃ dakaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2180: Aṇṇo nīraṃ vanaṃ vālaṃ, toyaṃ ambu’dakañca kaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2182: Taraṅgo ca tathā bhaṅgo, ūmi vīci pumitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2183: Ullolo tu ca kallolo, mahāvīcīsu kathyate.
anya-e0809n:2185: Jambālo kalalaṃ paṅko, cikkhallaṃ kaddamo pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2186: Pulinaṃ vālukā vaṇṇu, marū’ru sikatā bhave.
anya-e0809n:2189: Tīraṃ tu kūlaṃ rodhañca, patīrañca taṭaṃ tisu.
anya-e0809n:2191: Pāraṃ paramhi tīramhi, oraṃ tva’pāra muccate;
anya-e0809n:2192: Uḷumpo uḷupo (ka.) tu plavo kullo, taro ca paccarī’tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2194: Taraṇī tari nāvā ca, kūpako tu ca kumbhakaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2202: Poto pavahanaṃ vuttaṃ, doṇi tvi’tthī tathā’mbaṇaṃ ammaṇaṃ (sī.).
anya-e0809n:2204: Gabhīra ninna gambhīrā, tho ttānaṃ tabbipakkhake;
anya-e0809n:2208: Dhīvaro macchiko maccha, bandha kevaṭṭa jālikā.
anya-e0809n:2211: Rohito magguro siṅgī, balajo muñja pāvusā.
anya-e0809n:2213: Sattavaṅko savaṅko ca, naḷamīno ca gaṇḍako;
anya-e0809n:2219: Pāsāṇamaccho pāṭhīno, vaṅko tu baḷiso bhave;
anya-e0809n:2223: Kakkaṭako kuḷīro ca, jalūkā tu ca rattapā;
anya-e0809n:2227: Atha sippī ca sutti’tthī, saṅkhe tu kambu’nitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2230: Jalāsayo jalādhāro, gambhīro rahado tha ca;
anya-e0809n:2233: Taḷāko ca saro’nitthī, vāpī ca sarasī’tthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2236: Anotatto tathā kaṇṇa, muṇḍo ca rathakārako;
anya-e0809n:2237: Chaddanto ca kuṇālo ca, vuttā mandākinī’tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2240: Āhāvo tu nipānañcā, khātaṃ tu devakhātakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2242: Savantī ninnagā sindhu, saritā āpagā nadī;
anya-e0809n:2243: Bhāgīrathī tu gaṅgā tha, sambhedo sindhusaṅgamo.
anya-e0809n:2245: Gaṅgā’ciravatī ceva, yamunā sarabhū (sarabū sarayū (ka.) ) mahī;
anya-e0809n:2246: Imā mahānadī pañca, candabhāgā sarassatī sarasvatī (sī. ṭī.).
anya-e0809n:2248: Nerañjarā ca kāverī, nammadādī ca ninnagā;
anya-e0809n:2249: Vārimaggo paṇālī’tthī panāḷī (ṭī.), pume candanikā tu ca.
anya-e0809n:2254: Anitthī padumaṃ paṅke, ruhaṃ nalina pokkharaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2258: Kiñjakkho kesaro nitthī, daṇḍo tu nāla muccate.
anya-e0809n:2260: Bhisaṃ muḷālo nitthī ca, bījakoso tu kaṇṇikā;
anya-e0809n:2275: Sā’ṅgo’pāṅgehi kathyante, kaṇḍe vaggā iha kkamā.
anya-e0809n:2280: Sobhanaṃ ruciraṃ sādhu, manuññaṃ cāru sundaraṃ;
anya-e0809n:2281: Vaggu manoramaṃ kantaṃ, hārī mañju ca pesalaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2283: Bhaddaṃ vāmañca kalyāṇaṃ, manāpaṃ laddhakaṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2286: Mukhyo padhānaṃ pāmokkho, para maggañña muttaraṃ;
anya-e0809n:2287: Paṇītaṃ paramaṃ seyyo, gāmaṇī seṭṭha sattamā.
anya-e0809n:2290: Sīha kuñjara saddūlā, dī tu samāsagā pume.
anya-e0809n:2293: Iṭṭhaṃ tu subhagaṃ hajjaṃ, dayitaṃ vallabhaṃ piyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2295: Tucchañca rittakaṃ suññaṃ, athā’sārañca pheggu ca;
anya-e0809n:2296: Mejjhaṃ pūtaṃ pavitto tha, aviraddho apaṇṇako.
anya-e0809n:2298: Ukkaṭṭho ca pakaṭṭho tha, nihīno hīna lāmakā;
anya-e0809n:2303: Brahā mahantaṃ vipulaṃ, visālaṃ puthulaṃ puthu.
anya-e0809n:2305: Garu’ru vitthiṇṇa matho, pīnaṃ thūlañca pīvaraṃ;
anya-e0809n:2306: Thullañca vaṭharañcā tha, ācitaṃ nicitaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:2308: Sabbaṃ samatta makhilaṃ, nikhilaṃ sakalaṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n:2311: Bhūri pahutaṃ pacuraṃ, bhiyyo sambahulaṃ bahu;
anya-e0809n:2314: Parosatādī te, yesaṃ, paraṃ mattaṃ satādito;
anya-e0809n:2315: Parittaṃ sukhumaṃ khuddaṃ, thoka mappaṃ kisaṃ tanu.
anya-e0809n:2322: Sakāsaṃ antikaṃ ñattaṃ, dūraṃ tu vippakaṭṭhakaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2324: Nirantaraṃ ghanaṃ sandaṃ, viraḷaṃ pelavaṃ tanu;
anya-e0809n:2325: Athā yataṃ dīgha matho, nittalaṃ vaṭṭa vaṭṭulaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2327: Ucco tu unnato tuṅgo, udaggo ceva ucchito;
anya-e0809n:2328: Nīco rasso vāmano tha, ajimho paguṇo uju.
anya-e0809n:2330: Aḷāraṃ vellitaṃ vaṅkaṃ, kuṭilaṃ jimha kuñcitaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2331: Dhuvo ca sassato nicco, sadātana sanantanā.
anya-e0809n:2334: Lahu sallahukaṃ cātha, saṅkhyātaṃ gaṇitaṃ mitaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2336: Tiṇhaṃ tu tikhiṇaṃ tibbaṃ, caṇḍaṃ uggaṃ kharaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:2340: Thāvaro jaṅgamā añño, lolaṃ tu cañcalaṃ calaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2345: Kurūraṃ kaṭhinaṃ daḷhaṃ, niṭṭhuraṃ kakkhaḷaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:2348: Jighaññaṃ carimaṃ pubbaṃ, tva’ggaṃ paṭhama mādi so;
anya-e0809n:2351: Byattaṃ puṭa phuṭaṃ (sī.) ñca mudu tu, sukumārañca komalaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2354: Itarā’ññataro eko, añño bahuvidho tu ca;
anya-e0809n:2355: Nānārūpo ca vividho, abādhaṃ tu niraggalaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2357: Athe’kākī ca ekacco, eko ca ekako samā;
anya-e0809n:2358: Sādhāraṇañca sāmaññaṃ, sambādho tu ca saṃkaṭaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2360: Vāmaṃ kaḷevaraṃ sabyaṃ; Apasabyaṃ tu dakkhiṇaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2366: Nipuṇo ca paṭu cheko, cāturo dakkha pesalā;
anya-e0809n:2367: Bālo dattu jalo mūḷho, mando viññū ca bāliso.
anya-e0809n:2370: Mahātaṇho mahiccho tha, hadayī hadayālu ca.
anya-e0809n:2372: Sumano haṭṭhacitto tha, dummano vimano pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2377: Vissuto vidito ceva, pasiddho pākaṭo bhave.
anya-e0809n:2383: Dānāraho dakkhiṇeyyo, siniddho tu ca vacchalo;
anya-e0809n:2387: Kāruṇiko dayālupi, sūrato ussuko tu ca;
anya-e0809n:2390: Parādhīno parāyatto, āyatto tu ca santako;
anya-e0809n:2391: Pariggaho adhīno ca, sacchando tu ca serini.
anya-e0809n:2397: Kāmayitā tu kamitā, kāmano kāmi kāmuko;
anya-e0809n:2407: Sahano khamano khantā, titikkhavā ca khantimā.
anya-e0809n:2409: Saddhāyutto tu saddhālu, dhajavā tu dhajālu ca lajjālutu ca lajjavā (ka.);
anya-e0809n:2410: Niddālu niddāsīlo tha, bhassaro bhāsuro bhave.
anya-e0809n:2412: Naggo digambaro’vattho, ghasmaro tu ca bhakkhako;
anya-e0809n:2413: Eḷamūgo tu vattuñca, sotuṃ cā’kusalo bhave.
anya-e0809n:2416: Vācālo bahugārayha, vace vattā tu so vado.
anya-e0809n:2423: Sīsacchejjamhi vajjho tha, nikato ca saṭho’nuju;
anya-e0809n:2427: Anisamma hi yo kiccaṃ, puriso vadhabandhanādi mācarati;
anya-e0809n:2430: Khuddo kadariyo thaddha, maccharī kapaṇo pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2431: Akiñcano daliddo ca, dīno niddhana duggatā.
anya-e0809n:2434: Atha yācanako atthī, yācako ca vanibbako.
anya-e0809n:2442: Rādhito sādhito cātha, nippakkaṃ kuthitaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:2445: Nuṇṇo nuttā’tta, khittā ce’, ritā viddhā tha kampito;
anya-e0809n:2446: Dhūto ādhūta calitā, nisitaṃ tu ca tejitaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2448: Pattabbaṃ gamma māpajjaṃ āsajjaṃ (ka.), pakkaṃ pariṇataṃ samā;
anya-e0809n:2449: Veṭhitaṃ tu valayitaṃ, ruddhaṃ saṃvuta māvutaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2455: Lajjito hīḷito cātha, sanitaṃ dhanitaṃ pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2459: Siddhe nipphanna nibbattā, dārite bhinna bheditā;
anya-e0809n:2460: Channo tu chādite cātha, viddhe chiddita vedhitā.
anya-e0809n:2472: Bhaṭṭhaṃ tu galitaṃ pannaṃ, cutañca dhaṃsitaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:2480: Anvesitaṃ gavesitaṃ, laddhaṃ tu patta muccate.
anya-e0809n:2483: Pālitaṃ atha ossaṭṭhaṃ, cattaṃ hīnaṃ samujjhitaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2498: Ñeyyaṃ liṅga miha kvāpi, paccayatthavasena ca;
anya-e0809n:2501: Damo ca damatho danti, vattaṃ tu suddhakammani;
anya-e0809n:2504: Bhedo vidāro phuṭanaṃ, tappanaṃ tu ca pīṇanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2508: Ninnimittaṃ yadicchā thā’, pucchanā nandanāni ca;
anya-e0809n:2518: Pacā pāko havo huti hūbhi (sī. amarakosa),
anya-e0809n:2521: Jīraṇaṃ jāni tāṇaṃ tu, rakkhaṇaṃ pamitippamā;
anya-e0809n:2525: Nigādo nigado mādo, mado pasiti bandhanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2539: Majjhanhiko majjhantiko (ṭī. sī. pī.) tu majjhanho, vemattaṃ tu ca nānatā.
anya-e0809n:2541: Vā jāgaro jāgariyaṃ jāgariyo (ṭī.), pavāho tu pavatti ca;
anya-e0809n:2553: Osānaṃ pariyosānaṃ, ukkaṃso’tisayo bhave avasānaṃ samāpanaṃ (?);
anya-e0809n:2557: Kiccaṃ tu karaṇīyañca, saṅkhāro vāsanā bhave.
anya-e0809n:2562: Pāṭho nipāṭho nipaṭho, vicayo magganā pume;
anya-e0809n:2576: Samayo samavāye ca, samūhe kāraṇe khaṇe;
anya-e0809n:2577: Paṭivedhe siyā kāle, pahāne lābha diṭṭhisu.
anya-e0809n:2580: Pamāṇe ca pasaṃsāyaṃ, akkhare ca yase guṇe.
anya-e0809n:2586: Cakkaṃ sampattiyaṃ cakka, ratane maṇḍale bale.
anya-e0809n:2599: Attho payojane saddā, bhidheyye vuddhiyaṃ dhane;
anya-e0809n:2605: Guṇo paṭala rāsīsu, ānisaṃse ca bandhane;
anya-e0809n:2606: Appadhāne ca sīlādo, sukkādimhi jiyāya ca.
anya-e0809n:2609: Bhūto satta mahābhūtā, manussesu na nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2611: Vāccaliṅgo atītasmiṃ, jāte patte same mato;
anya-e0809n:2616: Anto nitthī samīpe cā, vasāne padapūraṇe;
anya-e0809n:2619: Nikāye sandhi sāmañña, ppasūtīsu kule bhave;
anya-e0809n:2623: Vāsaṭṭhāne ca gamane, visaṭatte visaratta visadatte gatīritā.
anya-e0809n:2625: Phale vipassanā dibba, cakkhu sabbaññutāsu ca;
anya-e0809n:2631: Kesohāraṇa, jīvita, vuttisu vapane ca vāpasamakaraṇe;
anya-e0809n:2632: Kathane pamuttabhāva, jjhenādo jjhesanādo (sī.) vutta mapi tīsu.
anya-e0809n:2637: Sotaviññeyya satthesu, sutaṃ putte suto siyā;
anya-e0809n:2639: Kappo kāle yuge lese, paññatti paramāyusu;
anya-e0809n:2650: Byavadhāne vinaṭṭhe ca, bhede chidde manasya’pi.
anya-e0809n:2652: Ārogye kusalaṃ iṭṭha, vipāke kusalo tathā;
anya-e0809n:2661: Sevito yena yo niccaṃ, tatthāpi visayo siyā;
anya-e0809n:2662: Rūpādike janapade, tathā dese ca gocare.
anya-e0809n:2664: Bhāvo padatthe sattāya, madhippāya kriyāsu ca;
anya-e0809n:2667: So bandhave’ttani ca saṃ, so dhanasmi manitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2668: Sā pume sunakhe vutto, ttaniye so tiliṅgiko.
anya-e0809n:2670: Suvaṇṇaṃ kanake vuttaṃ, suvaṇṇo garuḷe tathā;
anya-e0809n:2673: Varo devādikā devādito (sī.) iṭṭhe, jāmātari patimhi ca,
anya-e0809n:2674: Uttame vāccaliṅgo so, varaṃ mandappiye byayaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2679: Pitāmahe jine seṭṭhe, brāhmaṇe ca pitūsvapi;
anya-e0809n:2680: Brahmā vutto tathā brahmaṃ, vede tapasi vuccate.
anya-e0809n:2683: Mekhalāyaṃ matā kacchā, kaccho vutto latāya ca.
anya-e0809n:2687: Pamāṇaṃ hetu satthesu, māne ca saccavādini;
anya-e0809n:2690: Sattaṃ dabba’ttabhāvesu, pāṇesu ca bale, siyā bale sakkā (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n:2699: Padaṃ ṭhāne parittāṇe, nibbānamhi ca kāraṇe;
anya-e0809n:2700: Sadde vatthumhi koṭṭhāse, pāde tallañchane mataṃ.
anya-e0809n:2705: Khuddā ca makkhikābhede, madhumhi khudda, mappake;
anya-e0809n:2706: Adhame kapaṇe cāpi, bahumhi catūsu ttisu.
anya-e0809n:2708: Takke maraṇaliṅge ca, ariṭṭhaṃ asubhe subhe,;
anya-e0809n:2709: Ariṭṭho āsave kāke, nimbe ca pheniladdume.
anya-e0809n:2714: Mittakāre lañjadāne, bale rāsi vipattisu balarāsi vipattisu (ka.);
anya-e0809n:2717: Khandhe bhave nimittamhi, rūpaṃ vaṇṇe ca paccaye;
anya-e0809n:2718: Sabhāva sadda saṇṭhāna, rūpajjhāna vapūsu ca.
anya-e0809n:2720: Vatthu kilesa kāmesu, icchāyaṃ madane rate;
anya-e0809n:2721: Kāmo, kāmaṃ nikāme, cā, nuññāyaṃ kāma mabyayaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2729: Vuddhiyaṃ janane kāma, dhātvādīmhi ca pattiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2741: Ārammaṇe ca saṃsaṭṭhe, vokiṇṇe nissaye tathā;
anya-e0809n:2744: Tīsu channaṃ patirūpe, chādite ca nigūhite;
anya-e0809n:2756: Viññāṇe cittakamme ca, vicitte citta muccate;
anya-e0809n:2759: Sāmaṃ vedantare sāntve, taṃ pīte sāmale tisu;
anya-e0809n:2760: Sayamatthe byayaṃ sāmaṃ, sāmā ca sārivāyapi.
anya-e0809n:2762: Pume ācariyādimhi, garu guru (ka. ṭī.) mātāpitūsvapi;
anya-e0809n:2763: Garu tīsu mahante ca, dujjarā’lahukesu ca.
anya-e0809n:2765: Accite vijjamāne ca, pasatthe sacca sādhusu;
anya-e0809n:2769: Devo visuddhidevā’do, megha maccu nabhesu ca;
anya-e0809n:2770: Athopi taruṇe satte, corepi māṇavo bhave.
anya-e0809n:2775: Yoni kāma siri’ssare, dhammu’yyāma yase bhagaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2776: Uḷāro tīsu vipule, seṭṭhe ca madhure siyā.
anya-e0809n:2778: Sampanno tīsu sampuṇṇe, madhure ca samaṅgini;
anya-e0809n:2779: Saṅkhā tu ñāṇe koṭṭhāsa, paññatti gaṇanesu ca.
anya-e0809n:2782: Atho māne pakāreca, koṭṭhāseca vidho dvisu.
anya-e0809n:2785: Ñāṇe ca somanasseca, vedo chandasi co’ccate.
anya-e0809n:2787: Khandhakoṭṭhāsa, passāva, magga, hetūsu yoni sā yoni so (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n:2788: Kāle tu kūle sīmāyaṃ, velā rāsimhi bhāsitā.
anya-e0809n:2790: Vohāro sadda paṇṇatti, vaṇijjā cetanāsu ca;
anya-e0809n:2795: Rāge tu mānaso cittā, rahattesu ca mānasaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2797: Mūlaṃ bhe santike mūla, mūle hetumhi pābhate;
anya-e0809n:2798: Rūpādyaṃ’sa pakaṇḍesu, khandho rāsi guṇesu ca.
anya-e0809n:2801: Atho hadayavatthumhi, citte ca hadayaṃ ure.
anya-e0809n:2807: Ālambaro tu sārambhe, bheribhede ca dissati.
anya-e0809n:2813: Vissāse yācanāyañca, peme ca paṇayo mato.
anya-e0809n:2818: Samatthane mato citte, kaggatāyaṃ samādhi ca;
anya-e0809n:2823: Bhūmibhāge kilese ca, male cā’ṅgaṇa muccate.
anya-e0809n:2825: Dhanādidappe paññāya, abhimāno mato tha ca;
anya-e0809n:2826: Apadeso nimitte ca, chale ca kathane mato.
anya-e0809n:2828: Citte kāye sabhāve ca, so attā parama’ttani;
anya-e0809n:2829: Atha gumbo ca thambasmiṃ thambhasmiṃ (ṭī.), samūhe balasajjane.
anya-e0809n:2831: Antoghare kusūle ca, koṭṭho ntokucchiyaṃ pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2835: Atho sikhaṇḍe tūṇīre, kalāpo nikare mato.
anya-e0809n:2837: Cūḷā saṃyatakesesu, makuṭe moḷi ca dvisu;
anya-e0809n:2838: Saṅkho tva’nitthiyaṃ kambu, nalāṭa’ṭṭhīsu lalāṭaṭṭhīsu (sī.) gopphake.
anya-e0809n:2840: Pakkho kāle bale sādhye, sakhī vājesu paṅgule;
anya-e0809n:2841: Dese’ṇṇave pume sindhu, saritāyaṃ sa nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2843: Gaje kareṇu purise, so hatthiniya mitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2846: Visāṇaṃ tīsu mātaṅga, dante ca pasusiṅgake;
anya-e0809n:2847: Koṭiyaṃ tu mato koṇo, tathā vādittavādane.
anya-e0809n:2849: Vaṇippathe ca nagare, vede ca nigamo tha ca;
anya-e0809n:2853: Harite tu suvaṇṇe ca, vāsudeve harī’rito.
anya-e0809n:2856: Uttaṃso tva’ vataṃso ca, kaṇṇapūre ca sekhare.
anya-e0809n:2861: Cūḷā jālā padhāna’gga, moracūḷāsu sā sikhā;
anya-e0809n:2868: Aṃse sippe kalā kāle, bhāge candassa soḷase.
anya-e0809n:2876: Kriyacitte ca karaṇe, kiriyaṃ kammani kriyā;
anya-e0809n:2877: Sunisāyaṃ tu kaññāya, jāyāya ca vadhū matā.
anya-e0809n:2880: Suttaṃ pāvacane riṭṭhe siddhe (ṭī.), tante taṃ supite tisu.
anya-e0809n:2882: Rājaliṅgo’sabhaṅgesu, rukkhe ca kakudo kakudho (ṭī. sī.) pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2885: Vohāre jetu micchāyaṃ, kīḷādo cāpi devanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:2886: Bhariyāyaṃ tu kedāre, sarīre khetta mīritaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2889: Sūlaṃ tu nitthiyaṃ heti, bhede saṃku rujāsu ca.
anya-e0809n:2892: Rathādyaṅge tu ca yugo, kappamhi yugale yugaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2894: Itthipupphe ca reṇumhi, rajo pakatije guṇe;
anya-e0809n:2898: Paṇḍake joti nakkhatta, raṃsīsva’ggimhi joti so.
anya-e0809n:2900: Kaṇḍo nitthī sare daṇḍe, vagge cāvasare pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2901: Uddhaṃbāhudvayamāne bāhudvayummāne (sī. ka.), sūrattepi ca porisaṃ.
anya-e0809n:2907: Padhāne tu ca sānumhi, visāṇe siṅga muccate.
anya-e0809n:2910: Heme pañcasuvaṇṇe ca, nikkho nitthī pasādhane.
anya-e0809n:2912: Tithibhede ca sākhādi, phaḷumhi pabba muccate;
anya-e0809n:2925: Sassate ca dhuvo tīsu, dhuvaṃ takke ca nicchite.
anya-e0809n:2927: Hare sivo, sivaṃ bhadda, mokkhesu, jambuke sivā;
anya-e0809n:2928: Senāyaṃ sattiyañceva, thūlatte ca balaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:2931: Devabhede vasu pume, paṇḍakaṃ ratane dhane.
anya-e0809n:2933: Nibbānaṃ atthagamane, apavagge siyā tha ca;
anya-e0809n:2937: Sukkaṃ tu sambhave, sukko, dhavale, kusale tisu.
anya-e0809n:2939: Dāyo dāne vibhattabba, dhane ca pitunaṃ vane dhane (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n:2942: Paribhāsana makkose, niyame bhāsane tha ca,
anya-e0809n:2949: Tāto tāḷo (sī.) tu kuñcikāyañca, tūriyaṅge dumantare.
anya-e0809n:2951: Pupphe phale ca pasavo, uppāde gabbhamocane;
anya-e0809n:2961: Majjhimo dehamajjhasmiṃ, majjhabhave ca so tisu.
anya-e0809n:2964: Sobhā sampattīsu sirī, lakkhītthī devatāya ca.
anya-e0809n:2966: Kumāro yuvarāje ca, khande vutto susumhi ca;
anya-e0809n:2969: Paṇo vetana mūlesu, vohāre ca dhane mato;
anya-e0809n:2972: Asubhe ca subhe kamme, bhāgyaṃ vuttaṃ dvaye pyatha;
anya-e0809n:2978: Cāge sabhāve nimmāne, saggo jjhāye divepyatha;
anya-e0809n:2979: Rohito lohite maccha, bhede ceva migantare.
anya-e0809n:2985: Dabbaṃ bhabbe guṇādhāre, vitte ca budha dārusu.
anya-e0809n:2987: Mānaṃ pamāṇe patthādo, māno vutto vidhāya ca;
anya-e0809n:2988: Atho parissame vutto, vāyāmo vīriyepi ca.
anya-e0809n:2991: Chidde tu chiddavante ca, susiraṃ tūriyantare.
anya-e0809n:2994: Atho gārava bhītīsu, saṃvege sambhamo mato.
anya-e0809n:2999: Māse jeṭṭho, tivuddhā’ti, ppasatthesu ca tīsu so;
anya-e0809n:3000: Dhamme ca maṅgale seyyo, so pasatthatare tisu.
anya-e0809n:3002: Ādiccādimhi gahaṇe, nibandhe ca ghare gaho;
anya-e0809n:3006: Bimbaṃ tu paṭibimbe ca, maṇḍale bimbikāphale.
anya-e0809n:3011: Samā vasse, samo kheda, santīsu, so nibhe tisu;
anya-e0809n:3015: Rattaṃ tu soṇite, tambā, nuratta, rañjite tisu.
anya-e0809n:3017: Tace kāye ca tanvitthī, tīsva’ppe viraḷe kise;
anya-e0809n:3018: Utubhede tu sisiro, hime so sītale tisu.
anya-e0809n:3020: Sakkharā guḷabhede ca, kathalepi ca dissati;
anya-e0809n:3021: Anuggahe tu saṅkhepe, gahaṇe saṅgaho mato.
anya-e0809n:3023: Dakkhe ca tikhiṇe byatte, rogamutte paṭuttisu;
anya-e0809n:3024: Rājā tu khattiye vutto, naranāthe pabhumhi ca.
anya-e0809n:3026: Khalañca dhaññakaraṇe, kakke nīce khalo bhave;
anya-e0809n:3030: Bhayaṅkare tu kaṭhine, kurūro tīsu niddaye.
anya-e0809n:3035: Adharo tīsvadho hīne, pume dantacchade pyatha;
anya-e0809n:3036: Sussusā sotu micchāya, sā pāricariyāya ca.
anya-e0809n:3038: Hattho pāṇimhi ratane, gaṇe soṇḍāya bhantare;
anya-e0809n:3039: Āvāṭe udapāne ca, kūpo kumbhe ca dissati.
anya-e0809n:3042: Vajjabhede ca vita taṃ, taṃ vitthāre tiliṅgikaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3044: Sāro bale thiraṃse ca, uttame so tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n:3047: Mandire rogabhede ca, khayo apacayamhi ca;
anya-e0809n:3048: Vāḷo tu sāpade sappe, kurūre so tiliṅgiko.
anya-e0809n:3050: Sālo sajjaddume rukkhe, sālāgehe ca dissati;
anya-e0809n:3051: Sote tu savanaṃ vuttaṃ, yajane sutiyampi ca.
anya-e0809n:3053: Tīsu pato pareto ca, mate ca petayonije;
anya-e0809n:3054: Khyāte tu haṭṭhe viññāte, patītaṃ vāccaliṅgikaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3056: Adhippāye ca ādhāre, āsayo kathito tha ca;
anya-e0809n:3057: Pattaṃ pakkhe dale, patto, bhājane so gate tisu.
anya-e0809n:3059: Kusale sukataṃ, suṭṭhu, kate ca sukato tisu;
anya-e0809n:3063: Assādane tu rasanaṃ, jivhāyañca dhanimhi ca.
anya-e0809n:3065: Paṇīto tīsu madhure, uttame vihite pyatha;
anya-e0809n:3068: Pāpasmiṃ gagane dukkhe, byasane cā’gha muccate;
anya-e0809n:3069: Samūhe paṭalaṃ netta, roge vuttaṃ chadimhi ca.
anya-e0809n:3072: Sattannaṃ pūraṇe seṭṭhe, tisante sattamo tisu.
anya-e0809n:3074: Ojā tu yāpanāyañca, ojo ditti balesu ca;
anya-e0809n:3075: Atho nisāmanaṃ vuttaṃ, dassane savanepi ca.
anya-e0809n:3077: Gabbho kucchiṭṭhasatte ca, kucchi ovarakesu ca;
anya-e0809n:3083: Asumhi āyumhi (ṭī.), 407-gāthā passitabbā ca bale pāṇo, satte hadayagā’nile;
anya-e0809n:3090: Saraṇaṃ tu vadhe gehe, rakkhitasmiñca rakkhaṇe.
anya-e0809n:3092: Thiyaṃ kantā piye, kanto, manuññe, so tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n:3093: Gavakkhe tu samūhe ca, jālaṃ macchādibandhane.
anya-e0809n:3096: Sasaddhe tīsu nivāpe, saddhaṃ, saddhā ca paccaye.
anya-e0809n:3098: Bījaṃ hetumhi aṭṭhismiṃ, aṅgajāte ca dissati;
anya-e0809n:3103: Āgamane tu dīghādi, nikāyesu ca āgamo.
anya-e0809n:3105: Santāno devarukkhe ca, vutto santatiyaṃ pyatha;
anya-e0809n:3109: Chāyā tu ātapābhāve, paṭibimbe pabhāya ca.
anya-e0809n:3111: Gimhe ghammo nidāgho ca, uṇhe sedajale pyatha;
anya-e0809n:3114: Aṅgā dese bahumha’ṅgaṃ, aṅgo dese vapumha’ṅga (ṭī.) tathā’vayavahetusu;
anya-e0809n:3118: Supinaṃ supine sutta, viññāṇe ta manitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3126: Vutto visārado tīsu, suppagabbhe ca paṇḍite;
anya-e0809n:3129: Drave vaṇṇe rasabhede, kasāyo surabhimhi ca;
anya-e0809n:3136: Kavace vāravāṇe ca, nimmokepi ca kañcuko.
anya-e0809n:3138: Lohabhede mataṃ tambaṃ, tambo ratte tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n:3141: Bodhane ca padāne ca, viññeyyaṃ paṭipādanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:3144: Satthaṃ āyudha ganthesu, lohe, sattho ca sañcaye;
anya-e0809n:3148: Atha kambu mato saṅkhe, suvaṇṇe valayepi ca.
anya-e0809n:3151: Dupphasse tikhiṇe tīsu, gadrabhe kakace kharo.
anya-e0809n:3163: Paṭibhānaṃ tu paññāyaṃ, upaṭṭhita girāya ca.
anya-e0809n:3166: Udare tu tathā pācā, nalasmiṃ gahaṇī’tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3168: Piyo bhattari, jāyāyaṃ, piyā, iṭṭhe piyo tisu;
anya-e0809n:3169: Yamarāje tu yugaḷe, saṃyame ca yamo bhave.
anya-e0809n:3171: Muddikassa ca pupphassa, rase khudde madhū’ritaṃ;
anya-e0809n:3172: Ulloce tu ca vitthāre, vitānaṃ punnapuṃsake.
anya-e0809n:3174: Apavagge ca salile, sudhāyaṃ amataṃ mataṃ;
anya-e0809n:3175: Mohe tu timire saṅkhyā, guṇe tama manitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3177: Khare cā’kāriye tīsu, rasamhi purise kaṭu;
anya-e0809n:3178: Paṇḍake sukate, puññaṃ, manuññe pavane tisu.
anya-e0809n:3180: Rukkho dumamhi, pharusā, siniddhesu ca so tisu;
anya-e0809n:3181: Uppattiyaṃ tu hetumhi, saṅge sukke ca sambhavo.
anya-e0809n:3183: Nimittaṃ kāraṇe vuttaṃ, aṅgajāte ca lañchane;
anya-e0809n:3186: Vede ca mantane manto, mantā paññāya muccate;
anya-e0809n:3189: Aruṇo raṃsibhede cā, byattarāge ca lohite;
anya-e0809n:3193: Ākāro kāraṇe vutto, saṇṭhāne iṅgitepi ca.
anya-e0809n:3195: Sudditthi tanaye khattā, uggo, tibbamhi so tisu;
anya-e0809n:3198: Kallaṃ pabhāte, niroga, sajjadakkhesu yuttadakkhesu (ka.) tīsu taṃ;
anya-e0809n:3201: Kapoto pakkhibhede ca, diṭṭho pārāvate tha ca;
anya-e0809n:3204: Tīsu khare ca kaṭhine, kakkaso sāhasappiye sāhasappiye=sāhasa+appiye (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n:3205: Akāriye tu guyhaṅge, cīre kopīna muccate.
anya-e0809n:3211: Athuppāde siyā dhūma, ketu vessānarepi ca.
anya-e0809n:3216: Apavagge vināse ca, nirodho rodhane pyatha;
anya-e0809n:3217: Bhaye paṭibhayaṃ vuttaṃ, tiliṅgaṃ taṃ bhayaṃkare.
anya-e0809n:3223: Upajāpe mato bhedo, visese ca vidāraṇe.
anya-e0809n:3229: Guṇukkaṃse ca vibhave, sampatti ceva sampadā.
anya-e0809n:3231: Bhūkhantīsu khamā, yogye, hite sakke yutte (ṭī.) 1001-gāthā passitabbā khamo tisu;
anya-e0809n:3232: Addho bhāge pathe kāle, ekaṃse’ddho’byayaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n:3235: Usabho’sadha go usabho usabhe (ṭī.) seṭṭhe, sū’sabhaṃ vīsayaṭṭhiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:3236: Setusmiṃ tanti pantīsu, nāriyaṃ pāḷi kathyate.
anya-e0809n:3238: Kaṭo jaye’tthinimitte, kilañje so kate tisu;
anya-e0809n:3241: Vitakke mathite takko, tathā sūciphale mato;
anya-e0809n:3245: Baddhanissita setesu, tīsu taṃ mihite sitaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3247: Thiyaṃ pajāpati dāre, brahme māre sure pume;
anya-e0809n:3248: Vāsudeve’ntake kaṇho, so pāpe asite tisu.
anya-e0809n:3251: Sakko inde janapade, sākiye, so khame tisu.
anya-e0809n:3253: Vajjane parihāro ca, sakkāre ceva rakkhaṇe;
anya-e0809n:3254: Sotāpannādike agge, ariyo tīsu, dvije pume.
anya-e0809n:3256: Susuko susumāre ca, bālake ca ulūpini;
anya-e0809n:3259: Asano piyake kaṇḍe, bhakkhaṇe khipane’ sanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:3260: Yuge’dhikāre vikāre (ṭī.) vīriye, padhāne cā’ntike dhuro.
anya-e0809n:3262: Kāḷe ca bhakkhite tīsu, lavitte asito pume;
anya-e0809n:3265: Ummāre esikatthambhe, indakhīlo mato tha ca;
anya-e0809n:3268: Dhaññaṃ sālyādike vuttaṃ, dhañño puññavati ttisu;
anya-e0809n:3269: Pāṇi hatthe ca satte bhū, saṇhakaraṇiyaṃ mato.
anya-e0809n:3271: Tīsu pītaṃ halidyābhe, haṭṭhe ca pāyite siyā;
anya-e0809n:3274: Lohitādimhi lobhe ca, rāgo ca rañjane mato;
anya-e0809n:3275: Padaro phalake bhaṅge, pavuddha dariyaṃ pica.
anya-e0809n:3281: Kāro’ gabhede sakkāre, kārā tu bandhanālaye.
anya-e0809n:3284: Pāpane ca padātismiṃ, gamane patti nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3286: Chiddaṃ randhañca vivaraṃ, susire dūsanepi ca;
anya-e0809n:3287: Muttā tu muttike, muttaṃ, passāve, muccite tisu.
anya-e0809n:3289: Nisedhe vāraṇaṃ, hatthi, liṅga hatthīsu vāraṇo;
anya-e0809n:3290: Dānaṃ cāge made suddhe, khaṇḍane lavane khaye.
anya-e0809n:3295: Haritasmiñca paṇṇe ca, palāso kiṃ sukaddume;
anya-e0809n:3298: Pakkaṃ phalamhi, taṃ nāsu, mmukhe nāsamukhe (ka.) pariṇate tisu;
anya-e0809n:3299: Piṇḍo ājīvane dehe, piṇḍane goḷake mato.
anya-e0809n:3301: Vaṭṭo paribbaye kammā, dike, so vaṭṭule tisu;
anya-e0809n:3304: Nāriyaṃ bhīru kathitā, bhīruke so tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n:3307: Vāmaṃ sabyamhi, taṃ cāru, viparītesu tīsva’tha;
anya-e0809n:3308: Saṅkhyābhede sarabye ca, cihaṇe lakkha muccate.
anya-e0809n:3321: Sambhave cā’suci pume, amejjhe tīsu dissati.
anya-e0809n:3323: Accho ikke pume vutto, pasannamhi tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n:3324: Baḷise selabhede ca, vaṅko, so kuṭile tisu.
anya-e0809n:3328: Sabbasmiṃ sakalo tīsu, addhamhi purise siyā.
anya-e0809n:3333: Rudhire lohitaṃ vuttaṃ, rattamhi lohito tisu;
anya-e0809n:3334: Uttamaṅge pume muddhā, muddho mūḷhe tiliṅgiko.
anya-e0809n:3336: Raṭṭhamhi vijitaṃ vuttaṃ, jite ca vijito tisu;
anya-e0809n:3337: Parittaṃ tu parittāṇe, paritto tīsu appake.
anya-e0809n:3342: Vaṅgo lohantare vaṅgā, dese pume bahumhi ca;
anya-e0809n:3343: Kammārabhaṇḍabhede ca, khaṭake muṭṭhi ca dvisu.
anya-e0809n:3348: Pume mahesī sugate, deviyaṃ nāriyaṃ matā;
anya-e0809n:3352: Vijjā vede ca sippe ca, tivijjādo ca buddhiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3355: Pajjaṃ siloke, pajjo’ddhe, pajjo pādahite tisu.
anya-e0809n:3358: Vidheyye assavo tīsu, pubbamhī purise siyā.
anya-e0809n:3363: Assattho tīsu assāsa, ppatte, bodhiddume pume;
anya-e0809n:3364: Tīsu luddo kurūre ca, nesādamhi pume siyā.
anya-e0809n:3366: Vilaggo tīsu laggasmiṃ, pume majjhamhi dissati;
anya-e0809n:3369: Kaṭṭhaṃ dārumhi, taṃ kicche, gahane kasite tisu;
anya-e0809n:3370: Sasantāne ca visaye, gocare’ jjhatta muccateti.
anya-e0809n:3373: Bhuvane ca jane loko, moretvaggimhi so sikhī;
anya-e0809n:3377: Vaṭabyāmesu nigrodho, dhaṅko tu vāyase bake;
anya-e0809n:3380: Ucchaṅge lakkhaṇe cā’ṅko, rasmi’tthī juti rajjusu;
anya-e0809n:3384: Sūraṃ’sūsu pume bhānū, daṇḍo tu muggare dame;
anya-e0809n:3392: Dāyādo bandhave putte, sire sīsaṃ tipumhi ca.
anya-e0809n:3397: Thambho thūṇa jaḷattesu, sūpo kummāsa byañjane;
anya-e0809n:3398: Gaṇḍo phoṭe kapolamhi, aggho mūlye ca pūjane.
anya-e0809n:3401: Bhāgye vidhi vidhāne ca, sare khagge ca sāyako.
anya-e0809n:3403: Sāraṅgo cātake eṇe, pattī tu sarapakkhisu;
anya-e0809n:3411: Amate tu sudhā lepe, abhikhyā nāma raṃsisu;
anya-e0809n:3412: Satti sāmatthiye satthe, mahī najjantare bhuvi;
anya-e0809n:3417: Pavatti vutti vattāsu, vetane bharaṇe bhati.
anya-e0809n:3420: Soppe pamāde tandī ca, yātrā gamana vuttisu.
anya-e0809n:3425: Icchāyaṃ jutiyaṃ kanti, rañjane sūrate rati;
anya-e0809n:3426: Gehe vasati vāse tha, nadī senāsu vāhinī.
anya-e0809n:3428: Patthe nāḷe ca nāḷi’tthī, gaṇe samiti saṅgame;
anya-e0809n:3429: Taṇhā lobhe pipāsāyaṃ, magga vuttīsu vattanī.
anya-e0809n:3431: Pāṇyaṅge nābhi cakkante, yāce viññatti ñāpane;
anya-e0809n:3432: Vitti tose vedanāyaṃ, ṭhāne tu jīvite ṭhiti.
anya-e0809n:3434: Taraṅge cā’ntare vīci, dhīratte dhāraṇe dhiti;
anya-e0809n:3435: Bhū bhūmiyañca bhamuke, sadde vede save suti.
anya-e0809n:3437: Gottaṃ nāme ca vaṃse tha, nagare ca ghare puraṃ;
anya-e0809n:3438: Okaṃ tu nissaye gehe, kulaṃ tu gottarāsisu.
anya-e0809n:3440: Heme vitte hiraññañca, paññāṇaṃ tva’ṅka vuddhisu;
anya-e0809n:3441: Athā’mbarañca khe vatthe, guyhaṃ liṅge rahasya’pi.
anya-e0809n:3443: Tapo dhamme vate ceva, pāpe tvā’gumhi kibbisaṃ;
anya-e0809n:3444: Ratanaṃ maṇi seṭṭhesu, vassaṃ hāyana vuṭṭhisu.
anya-e0809n:3446: Vanaṃ arañña vārīsu, khīramhi tu jale payo;
anya-e0809n:3447: Akkharaṃ lipi mokkhesu, methūnaṃ saṅgame rate.
anya-e0809n:3449: Sotaṃ kaṇṇe payovege, riṭṭhaṃ pāpā’subhesu ca;
anya-e0809n:3453: Vāccaliṅgā paramito, byatto tu paṇḍite phuṭe.
anya-e0809n:3459: Bībhaccho vikate bhīme, komale tikhiṇe mudu;
anya-e0809n:3460: Iṭṭhe ca madhure sādu, sādumhi madhuro piye.
anya-e0809n:3462: Site tu suddhe odāto, dvijivho sūcakā’hisu;
anya-e0809n:3468: Suci suddhe site pūte, pesalo dakkhacārusu;
anya-e0809n:3469: Adhamo kucchite ūne, appiye pya’liko bhave.
anya-e0809n:3471: Byāpe asuddhe saṃkiṇṇo, bhabbaṃ yogye ca bhāvini;
anya-e0809n:3472: Sukhumo appakā’ṇūsu, vuddho there ca paṇḍite.
anya-e0809n:3474: Subhe sādhumhi bhaddo tha, tyā’do ca vipule bahu;
anya-e0809n:3475: Dhīro budhe dhitimante, vellitaṃ kuṭile dhute.
anya-e0809n:3477: Visado byatta setesu, taruṇo tu yuve nave;
anya-e0809n:3482: Kalyāṇaṃ sundare cāpi, himo tu sītalepi ca.
anya-e0809n:3484: Lole tu sīghe capalo, vutte udita muggate;
anya-e0809n:3485: Āditte gabbite ditto, piṭṭhaṃ tu cuṇṇitepi ca.
anya-e0809n:3487: Vigate vāyite vāyane (ka.) vītaṃ, bhāvitaṃ vaḍḍhitepi ca;
anya-e0809n:3488: Bhajjite patite bhaṭṭho, puṭṭho pucchita posite.
anya-e0809n:3492: Sūro vīre ravisūre, duṭṭho kuddhe ca dūsite.
anya-e0809n:3496: Nindāyaṃ khepane khepo, niyamo nicchaye vate.
anya-e0809n:3507: Mālyaṃ tu pupphe taddāme, vāho tu sakaṭe haye.
anya-e0809n:3510: Bhe tārakā nettamajjhe, sīmā’ vadhi, ṭṭhitīsu ca.
anya-e0809n:3514: Satte thūle tīsu daḷho, latā sākhāya valliyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3518: Nīce puthujjano mūḷhe, bhattā sāmini dhārake.
anya-e0809n:3520: Sikhā, piñchesu sikhaṇḍo, satte tva’ttani puggalo;
anya-e0809n:3524: Vacco rūpe karīse tha, juti’tthī kantiraṃsisu;
anya-e0809n:3526: Labbhaṃ yutte ca laddhabbe, khaṇḍe paṇṇe dalaṃ mataṃ;
anya-e0809n:3527: Sallaṃ kaṇḍe salākāyaṃ, sucitte dhāvanaṃ gate;
anya-e0809n:3532: Mitte sahāye ca sakhā, vibhū niccappabhūsu so.
anya-e0809n:3534: Khagge kurūre nettiṃso, parasmiṃ atra tīsva’mu;
anya-e0809n:3539: Yānaṃ rathādo gamane, sarūpasmiṃ adho talaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3541: Majjho vilagge vemajjhe, pupphaṃ tu kusumo’tusu;
anya-e0809n:3542: Sīlaṃ sabhāve subbate, puṅgavo usabhe vare.
anya-e0809n:3545: Nettiṃse gaṇḍake khaggo, kadambo tu dume caye.
anya-e0809n:3548: Akkose sapathe sāpo, paṅkaṃ pāpe ca kaddame.
anya-e0809n:3551: Bale pabhāve vīriyaṃ, tejo tesu ca dittiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3553: Dhārā santati khaggaṅge, vānaṃ taṇhāya sibbane;
anya-e0809n:3554: Khattā sūte paṭihāre, vitti pīḷāsu vedanā.
anya-e0809n:3556: Thiyaṃ mati’cchāpaññāsu, pāpe yuddhe rave raṇo;
anya-e0809n:3557: Lavotu bindu’cchedesu, palāle’ palāse (ṭī.), palāpe-ṭī (453-1124) gāthā passitabbā tisaye bhusaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3559: Bādhā dukkhe nisedhe ca, mūlapadepi mātikā;
anya-e0809n:3563: Ketusmiṃ ketanaṃ gehe, ṭhāne bhūmi’tthiyaṃ bhuvi;
anya-e0809n:3564: Lekhye lekho rāji lekhā, pūjite bhagavā jine.
anya-e0809n:3566: Gadā satthe gado roge, nisajjā pīṭhesvā’sanaṃ;
anya-e0809n:3570: Bilaṃ koṭṭhāsa chiddesu, vajjaṃ dose ca bheriyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:3575: Yūpo thambhe ca pāsāde, ayanaṃ gamane pathe.
anya-e0809n:3588: Annādo āmisaṃ maṃse; Dikkhā tu yajane’ccane.
anya-e0809n:3592: Kusumaṃ thīraje pupphe, vānare tu budhe kavi.
anya-e0809n:3594: Adhare kharabhe oṭṭho, luddo tu luddakepi ca;
anya-e0809n:3595: Kalusaṃ tvā’vile pāpe, pāpe kali parājaye.
anya-e0809n:3597: Kantāro vana, duggesu, caro cāramhi cañcale;
anya-e0809n:3598: Janāvāse gaṇe gāmo, cammaṃ tu phalake tace.
anya-e0809n:3602: Sattāyaṃ bhavanaṃ gehe, lese tu khalite chalaṃ.
anya-e0809n:3604: Veraṃ pāpe ca paṭighe, taco cammani vakkale;
anya-e0809n:3607: Paṭihāre mukhe dvāraṃ, pete ñāte mato tisu;
anya-e0809n:3608: Māso paraṇṇa kālesu, naggo tva’celakepi ca.
anya-e0809n:3610: Dose ghāte ca paṭigho, migādo chagale pasu;
anya-e0809n:3611: Arūpe cā’vhaye nāmaṃ, daro daratha bhītisu.
anya-e0809n:3621: Havi sappimhi hotabbe, siro seṭṭhe ca muddhani;
anya-e0809n:3622: Vicārepi viveko tha, sikharī pabbate dume.
anya-e0809n:3624: Vego jave pavāhe ca, saṅku tu khilahetisu;
anya-e0809n:3625: Niggahīte kaṇe bindu, varāho sūkare gaje.
anya-e0809n:3642: Vatthe gandhe ghare vāso, cullo khudde ca uddhane.
anya-e0809n:3652: Sākhāyaṃ viṭapo thambhe, sattu khajjantare dise;
anya-e0809n:3655: Rāge raṅgo naccaṭṭhāne, pānaṃ peyye ca pītiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n:3661: Palālo palāpo (ka.) 453-gāthā passitabbā tu bhusamhi ca.
anya-e0809n:3663: Matā’vāṭe caye kāsu, panisā kāraṇe raho;
anya-e0809n:3671: Dasā’ vatthā paṭantesu, kāraṇaṃ ghāta, hetusu.
anya-e0809n:3673: Hatthidāne mado gabbe, ghaṭā ghaṭana rāsisu;
anya-e0809n:3678: Pāne pamode pīti’tthī, iṇe givā galepi ca.
anya-e0809n:3681: Bhaṅgo bhede paṭe bhaṅgaṃ, chattaṃ tu chavakepi ca.
anya-e0809n:3683: Ñāṇe bhuvi ca bhūri’ttī, anaṅge madano dume;
anya-e0809n:3691: Khette vappe (pākāramūle nettajale usume ca vappo-ṭī) vappo taṭepi ca;
anya-e0809n:3696: Saṅghāto yugagehaṅge, khāro ūse ca bhasmani.
anya-e0809n:3705: Abyayaṃ vuccate dāni, cirassaṃ tu ciraṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n:3706: Cirena cirarattāya, saha saddhiṃ samaṃ amā.
anya-e0809n:3709: Vajjane tu vinā nānā, antarena rite puthu.
anya-e0809n:3711: Balavaṃ suṭṭhu cā’tīvā, tisaye kimuta sva’ti;
anya-e0809n:3712: Aho tu kiṃ kimū’ dāhu, vikappe kimuto’da ca.
anya-e0809n:3716: He hare tha kathaṃ kiṃsu, nanu kacci nu kiṃ samā.
anya-e0809n:3719: Tagghe’ kaṃse sasakkañcā, ddhā kāmaṃ jātu ve have.
anya-e0809n:3721: Yāvatā tāvatā yāva, tāva kittāvatā tathā;
anya-e0809n:3724: Yathā tathā yatheve’vaṃ, yathānāma yathāhi ca;
anya-e0809n:3725: Seyyathāpye’vamevaṃ, vā, tatheva ca yathāpi ca.
anya-e0809n:3727: Evampi ca seyyathāpi, nāma yatharivā’pi ca;
anya-e0809n:3730: Saṃ sāmañca sayaṃ cātha, āma sāhu lahū’pi ca;
anya-e0809n:3735: Asākalye tu cana ci, nipphale tu mudhā bhave.
anya-e0809n:3737: Kadāci jātu tulyā’tha, sabbato ca samantato;
anya-e0809n:3738: Parito ca samantāpi, atha micchā musā bhave.
anya-e0809n:3740: Nisedhe na anomā’laṃ, nahi cetu sace yadi;
anya-e0809n:3744: Īsaṃ kiñci manaṃ appe, sahasā tu atakkite;
anya-e0809n:3749: Taṅkhaṇe sajju sapadi, balakkāre pasayha ca.
anya-e0809n:3751: Sudaṃ kho vo (ka.) assu yagghe ve,hā’dayo padapūraṇe;
anya-e0809n:3752: Antarena’ntarā anto, vassaṃ nūna ca nicchaye.
anya-e0809n:3754: Ānande sañca diṭṭhā tha, virodhakathane nanu;
anya-e0809n:3758: Nīcaṃ appe, mahatyu’ccaṃ, atha pāto page samā.
anya-e0809n:3762: Bahiddhā bāhirā bāhye, sīghetu saṇikaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n:3764: Atthaṃ adassane duṭṭhu, nindāyaṃ, vandane namo;
anya-e0809n:3765: Sammā suṭṭhu pasaṃsāyaṃ, atho sattāya matthi ca.
anya-e0809n:3769: Tato pare parasuve, hiyyotu divase gate.
anya-e0809n:3771: Yattha yatra yahiṃcātha, tattha tatra tahiṃtahaṃ;
anya-e0809n:3772: Atho uddhañca upari, heṭṭhā tu ca adho samā.
anya-e0809n:3774: Codane iṅgha handā’tha, ārādūrā ca ārakā;
anya-e0809n:3775: Parammukhā tu ca raho, sammukhā tvā’vi pātu ca.
anya-e0809n:3778: Nidassane iti’tthañca, evaṃ, kicche kathañci ca.
anya-e0809n:3782: Tiro tu tiriyaṃ cātha, kucchāyaṃ duṭṭhu ku’ccate.
anya-e0809n:3784: Suvatthi āsiṭṭhatthamhi, nindāyaṃ tu dhī dhi (ka.) kathyate;
anya-e0809n:3785: Kuhiñcanaṃ kuhiṃ kutra, kuttha kattha kahaṃ kva tha.
anya-e0809n:3789: Kadā kudācanaṃ cātha, tadāni ca tadā samā.
anya-e0809n:3794: Dassane tappare saṅge, pasaṃsā, gati, suddhisu;
anya-e0809n:3807: Pātubhāve viyoge ca, nisedhādo ni dissati;
anya-e0809n:3808: Atho nīharaṇe cevā, varaṇādo ca nī siyā.
anya-e0809n:3810: Uddhakamma viyoga tta, lābha titti samiddhisu;
anya-e0809n:3818: Sammā bhusa saha ppatthā, bhimukhatthesu saṅgate;
anya-e0809n:3822: Viyoge kalahe pātu, bhāve bhāse ca kucchane.
anya-e0809n:3825: Padhāna dakkhatā kheda, sahatthādo vi dissati.
anya-e0809n:3827: Viyoge jānane cā’dho,bhāga nicchaya bhāga’nicchaya (bhāga+anicchaya-ṭī) suddhisu;
anya-e0809n:3833: Dese lakkhaṇa vicche’ttha, mbhūta bhāgādike anu.
anya-e0809n:3837: Soka byāpana tatvesu, lakkhaṇādo siyā pari.
anya-e0809n:3850: Su sobhane sukhe sammā, bhusa suṭṭhu samiddhisu.
anya-e0809n:3861: Sambhāvane ca garahā, pekkhāsu ca samuccaye;
anya-e0809n:3864: Niddese vajjane pūjā, pagate vāraṇepi ca;
anya-e0809n:3865: Padussane ca garahā, corikā’do siyā apa.
anya-e0809n:3887: Pasaṃsāgarahāsaññā, sīkārādo svīkāra (ṭī.) pi nāma tha;
anya-e0809n:3896: Pācī, pura, ṅgatotthesu, puratthā paṭhame pyatha;
anya-e0809n:3909: Nu saṃsaye ca pañhe tha, nānā’ nekattha vajjane;
anya-e0809n:3910: Kiṃ tu pucchājigucchāsu, kaṃ tu vārimhi muddhani.
anya-e0809n:3912: Amā sahasamīpe tha, bhede appaṭhame puna;
anya-e0809n:3915: Patīcī carime pacchā, sāmi tvaddhe jigucchane;
anya-e0809n:3920: Bhiṃsāpane hiṃsāpane (ṭī.) dhī dhi (ka.) nindāyaṃ, pidhāne tiriyaṃ tiro.
anya-e0809n:3922: Tuna tvāna tave tvā tuṃ, dhā so thā kkhattu, meva ca;
anya-e0809n:3923: To tha tra hiñcanaṃ hiṃhaṃ, dhi ha hi dha dhunā rahi.
anya-e0809n:3925: Dāni vodācanaṃ dājja, thaṃ tattaṃ jjha jju ādayo;
anya-e0809n:3938: Iha yo kusalo matimā sa naro,
anya-e0809n:3950: Kittiyā viya sambādhī, katā khettehi vāpihi.
